exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR PROVIDING GOODS INFORMATION USING A DIGITAL BROADCASTING PROGRAM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An apparatus and a method for providing goods information using a digital broadcasting program are provided to enhance the efficiency in the product information searching operation by selectively searching the information over a specific company or product. CONSTITUTION: A user selects a digital TV of a certain company through an OSD(On Screen Display) menu screen, a CPU(Central Processing Unit) confirms corresponding intrinsic identification information. The CPU sets up a searching condition. When product information is searched, the CPU displays differentially an object corresponding to the corresponding product in a video. When the user selects the object, the CPU performs the access to a sales website.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: AN UNIFIED CONTROL UNIT FOR VARIABLE RACK STROKE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A switch and controller integrated variable rack stroke controlling device is provided to integrate a switch and a controller and to change rack strokes. CONSTITUTION: A switch and controller integrated variable rack stroke controlling method comprise: a step of receiving a manipulation of driver; a step of reading the measured value by sensing a vehicle velocity(301), an acceleration(303), a slop(305), and wheel rotation speeds(306a,306b); a step of deciding the rotational direction of the motor, and defining the motor driving time; and a step of controlling the motor according to the calculated control value.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: TREE TAG HAVING FUNCTION OF LIGHTING AND FLOWERPOT WITH SAID TREE TAG

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A tree name plate apparatus and a flowerpot having the same are provided can confirm easily name plate information by illuminating the name plate. CONSTITUTION: A name plate part(2) is equipped with the plant information and arranges LED for the name plate illumination and tree illumination. A support part(3) is embedded in the tree planting location and fixes the name plate part is fixed. A driving substrate part(6) controls the drive of LED. Photo sensors(5a,5b) drive the substrate part in order to light the LED in night time or a dark place.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: RACK BAR SUPPORTING DEVICE OF STEERING APPARATUS FOR VEHICLE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A rack bar support device of a steering system for a vehicle is provided to prevent the increase of an interval due to the abrasion of a support yoke. CONSTITUTION: A rack bar support device of a steering system for a vehicle comprises a support yoke(260), a yoke plug(310), a first impact absorption member(320), a second impact absorption member(330). The support yoke is inserted into a cylinder(250) of a gear-box(130) and supports a rear surface of a rack bar(140) in a front side. The support yoke has a mounting groove(315) with a recess on the facing side of the support yoke. The first impact absorption member in the mounting groove of the yoke plug is elastically transformed and absorbs impact. The second impact absorption member supports the support yoke with pressing the first impact absorption member.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: TUBE STRUCTURE FOR DISCHARGING FILLED CONTENT COMPLETELY

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A tube structure capable of completely discharging a filled content is provided to enable a user to completely squeeze content which is filed within a tube container and to remarkably reduce manufacturing costs. CONSTITUTION: A tube structure capable of completely discharging a filled content comprises: tube bodies(1,2) which is filled with the content; a shape-preservation plate(4) which is included on the front of the tube body and consists of a hard plastic material; an outlet(3) which is formed on the center of the shape-preservation plate and discharges the content(20); and an extrusion piston(10) which is included in the tube body to be located on the rear of the content.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SCISSORS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: Scissors are provided to prevent interference between fingers of two persons using the scissors at the same time. CONSTITUTION: Scissors(A) comprise a pair of scissor components(10). Each scissor component is composed of a cutting part(20) including blades(21), an operating part including finger holders(31), a hinge part located between the cutting part and the operating part, and one or more auxiliary finger rings(60).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SMOKELESS GRILL HAVING PLATE DIFFUSING HEAT

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A smokeless grill having a heat diffusing plate is provided to improve a cooking performance by evenly heating up an entire cooking plate due to forming an air ventilation gaps between grilling plates and a multi stage structured combustion chamber underneath the cooking plate. CONSTITUTION: A smokeless grill having a heat diffusing plate comprises a case(10) which has a pair of fixing projection members(12) on the both sides of the interior and an inverse L-shaped unit grill plates(20) which have an overflow preventing threshold(22) and a heat holding wall(23). Unit grilling plates are placed on the fixing projection members and combined with a stepped multi-stage. A gap for ventilation is formed between the front end of the upper grilling plate and rear end of the lower grilling plate.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PORTABLE DIGITAL MEASURING AND OUTPUTTING DEVICE USING UNINTERRUPTIBLE POWER SUPPLY

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A portable digital measuring and outputting device using uninterruptible power supply is provided, which can output the output result of a portable digital apparatus using a miniature uninterruptible power supply system. CONSTITUTION: An uninterruptible power supply system(30) supplies power. A main body(10) an uninterruptible power supply system. A digital measuring device(40) is connected to the uninterruptible power supply system and measures external environment. A monitor(20) is connected to the uninterruptible power supply system and digital measuring device and outputs the measurement result of the digital measuring device.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD AND DEVICES FOR CARBON NANOTUBE CUTTING-DISPERSION

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method and a device for a carbon nano tube cutting-dispersion are provided to highly disperse the carbon nano tube by collisions among the carbon nano tube, a wall body or a moving body. CONSTITUTION: A method for a carbon nano tube cutting-dispersion comprises the following steps: cutting the carbon nano tube(31) using an impact energy by colliding the carbon nano tube to an inner wall(33) of a chamber; enhancing the collision rate and the cutting rate of the carbon nano tube by operating a moving body inside the chamber; and enhancing the collision rate and the cutting rate by spraying the carbon nano tube from more than two positions to one position at the same time. A device for the carbon nano tube cutting-dispersion includes the chamber, and a sprayer to spray the carbon nano tube.

exch:applicant-name.name: INDUSTRY FOUNDATION OF CHONNAM NATIONAL UNIVERSITY

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: COIL SYSTEM FOR CONTROLLING MICROROBOT AND ELECTROMAGNETIC BASED ACTUATION SYSTEM ON 2 DIMENSIONAL PLANE USING THE COIL SYSTEM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A coil system structure for control of a micro robot and a two-dimensional plane electromagnetic drive system using the same are provided to omit the turning space of a coil system by controlling the displacement of a micro robot through control of current supplied to the helmholtz coil and the maxwell coil. CONSTITUTION: A coil systems structure comprises X- and Y-axis coil systems(201,203) which are arranged opposite each other. The Y-axis coil system is installed perpendicular to the X-axis coil system. One of helmholtz coils(205,209) and maxwell coils(207,211) is installed in the X-axis coil system. One of helmholtz coils(215,219) and maxwell coils(213,217) is installed in the Y-axis coil system.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PUSH STICK WITH BRUSH

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A pusher cleaner with a mite cleaning brush is provided to process sweeping and mopping at once to absorb dust and mites using a roller and a brush. CONSTITUTION: A pusher cleaner with a mite cleaning brush comprises: a frame(100) which includes a suction hole(110) which inhales dust and mites, a brush(120), a roller(130), a dust collecting part(140) which temporarily collects the dust and the mites which are inhaled, a cover(150), a connection pipe(160), and a floorcloth combining unit(170) which has a fitting projection(171) and a fitting groove(172); a pusher base(200) which includes a floorcloth plate(210) whose outer circumference is fixed by the fitting projection and the fitting groove, a floorcloth(220) which is attached with a Velcro, a combining pipe(230), and a joining pipe(240); and a pusher(300).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: CONSTRUCTION METHOD OF STACKING EARTH AND STONES

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A construction method for piling sand and stone is provided to easily and rapidly perform construction, and to reduce construction time and costs. CONSTITUTION: A construction method for piling sand and stone is as follows. Coupling protrusions(31) are formed. Coupling grooves are formed in stones(30). One ends of the coupling protrusions are inserted into the coupling grooves. The stones in which the coupling protrusions are installed are piled up. Gaps between the stones are weld using the epoxy resins(41), and are filled with loess(42). Each stone is fixed by welding each coupling protrusion. A covering stone(45) covers the top end of the piled stones.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: NON-REMOVAL AND NATURE-FRIENDLY REINFORCING METHOD OF THE EXISTING BRICKS WALL

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A non-removal type environment-friendly seismic retrofitting method of an existing masonry wall is provided to reinforce an existing masonry wall by spreading high-performance composites on one surface or both surfaces of the masonry wall. CONSTITUTION: A non-removal type environment-friendly seismic retrofitting method of an existing masonry wall is as follows. Foreign materials on the surface of an existing masonry wall are eliminated(S10). The surface of the existing masonry wall is polished using high-pressure water(S20). High-performance composites are spread on the surface of the masonry wall(S30).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: DELIVERY WAYBILL AND GOODS CLASSIFICATION METHOD USING DELIVERY WAYBILL

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A waybill with a number indicator and a cargo classification method using the same are provided to reduce the time for classifying cargo collected through a conveyor system by marking the numbers printed on the number indicator. CONSTITUTION: A waybill(70) in which transport information of cargo is printed comprises a number indicator(12). In the number indicator, numbers predetermined according to destination is marked. The marked numbers are read by a scanner. The length of the number indicator is segmented into two to four sections and the width is segmented into 10 sections.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: CONVEYER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A cargo loading/unloading conveyor is provided to adjust conveyor length depending on the distance between the cargo unloading point and the vehicle by adjusting the height and the inclination angle of the loading bed of the vehicle. CONSTITUTION: A cargo loading/unloading conveyor comprises a support(10), a main conveyor(20) and height adjusting rods(40a,40b). The support contacts with the ground while moving. The main conveyor is arranged on the top of the support. Cargo is moved on the main conveyor. The height adjusting rods are installed at the front and the rear between the support and the main conveyor. The height adjusting rods adjust the height and the angle of the main conveyor.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: WEEDER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A grass mower is provided to make a blade rotating at a high speed maintain a constant height, to enhance mobility of a supporter by combining a wheel with a first supporting member and a second supporting member. CONSTITUTION: A grass mower comprises: a tubular member(400); a blade(300) which is connected to one side end of the tubular member; a motor(200) which is connected to the other end of the tubular member and rotates the blade; and a supporter(100) which is connected to one side of the tubular member. The supporter includes: a first supporting member and a second supporting; a connection panel which is located on one side of the tubular member and has a plurality of holes; and a fixing device which protects the tubular member.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: STAND-ALONE SYSTEM FOR ENVIRONMENTAL GAS MEASUREMENT

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A stand-alone type environment gas measuring system is provided to make the convenient mount on a public space or a multiple usage place. CONSTITUTION: A stand-alone type environment gas measuring system comprises a CO2 sensor module(203), a CO sensor module(205), a NO2 sensor module(207), a VOCs sensor module(209), an O3 sensor module(211) and a controller(201). The CO2 sensor module detects the carbon dioxide among the air. The CO sensor module detects the carbon monoxide among the air. The NO2 sensor module detects the nitrogen dioxide among the air. The VOCs sensor module detects the contaminant of the formaldehyde(HCHO), toluene(C6H5CH3), HC, benzene(C6H6), xylene(C6h4(CH3)2), organic solvent, smoke, the environment hormone etc among the air. The O3 sensor module measures ozone(O3) concentration among the air. The controller controls the decision result to alarm output or the display.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: IN-CELL TYPE OPTICAL TOUCH SENSING LIQUID CRYSTAL DISPLAY AND METHOD FOR DETECTING LIGHT PERFORMED BY THE LCD

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An in-cell type optical touch sensing liquid crystal display and a method for detecting a light performed by the LCD is provided to reduce the load of a scan line by connecting a charge device in a light detection region of array substrate to a common line. CONSTITUTION: An array panel comprises a display region and a light sensing area. The light sensing area(300) comprises a switching element(301), a charge charging element(302), and an optical detecting device(303). A first terminal of the switching element receives a selection signal. The second terminal of the switching element is connected to a readout system. The first terminal of the charge charging element is connected to a third terminal of the switching element. The second terminal of the charge charging element is connected to a common line(308). The first terminal of the optical detecting device is connected to the n-th scan line. The second terminal of the optical detecting device is connected to the first terminal of the charge charging element.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: LOAD CELL FOR HAGER ROD OF EXHAUST SYTEM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A load cell for a ventilation measurement hanger rod is provided to reduce the compatibility which corresponding to the various shape and size of the ventilation measurement hanger rod. CONSTITUTION: A load cell for a ventilation measurement hanger rod comprises a body(12), a first and a second flange(14,16) and a sensor(18). The body comprises a through hole in an axial direction. The first and the second flange are arranged to be mutually faced in both ends of the body. The sensor is attached to the body side. The body is formed into the rectangular shape. The body comprises a first through hole(11) penetrated toward the first axial direction and the second through hole(13) penetrated toward the second axial direction.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: DOUBLE CYLINDER TYPE CIRCULAR KNITTING MACHINE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A double cylinder circular knitting machine is provided to smoothly perform a knitting process by adopting a lubrication structure on an upper cylinder and an upper sinker bed, and to from various knitted structures by independently moving an upper sinker and a lower sinker. CONSTITUTION: A double cylinder circular knitting machine comprises a circular knitting machine main body, an upper and a lower cylinders(21,22), a knitting device, and a sinker device(200). The knitting device includes a plurality of jacks(25,26) moved according to a plurality of grooves(21a), a plurality of double-headed needles(27), an upper cam box(23), a lower cam box, and a plurality of cams forming guide paths(28a,29a). The sinker device includes an upper and a lower sinker beds(210,220), a plurality of upper sinkers, and a plurality of lower sinkers.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SINKER APPARATUS FOR DOUBLE CYLINDER TYPE CIRCULAR KNITTING MACHINE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A sinker device of a double-cylinder circular knitting machine is provided to easily manufacture knitting fabric by improving operability of an upper sinker and a lower sinker which are installed between an upper cylinder and a lower cylinder. CONSTITUTION: A sinker device(200) of a double-cylinder circular knitting machine comprises the following: an upper sinker bed(210) consisting of a plurality of grooves which are formed to a radial shape and is fixed on the bottom of an upper cylinder(21); a lower sinker bed(22) formed to a curved cross section and is installed on the top of a lower cylinder; a plurality of upper sinkers(310,320) moved according to each groove of the upper sinker bed; and a plurality of lower sinkers(330,340) slid in a curved direction according to each groove of the lower sinker bed.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SINKER APPARATUS FOR KNITTING A PILE STITCH OF DOUBLE CYLINDER TYPE CIRCULAR KNITTING MACHINE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A sinker apparatus for pile knitting of a double-cylinder circular knitting machine is provided to manufacture textile having a good look by knitting a pile stitch of different shapes, and to improve productivity of products by increasing pile knitting speed. CONSTITUTION: A sinker apparatus for pile knitting of a double-cylinder circular knitting machine includes the following: a sinker bed(210) for knitting a pile stitch and is installed on the bottom of an upper cylinder; a sinker(310,320) moved according to each groove of the sinker bed; a base(230) rotating and supporting the sinker bed and is located on the bottom of the sinker bed; a guide cam(232) guiding the sinkers; and a pull cam(410) contacted to the rear end of the sinker.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ACTUATING APPARATUS OF THE SINKER FOR KNITTING A PILE STITCH

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A sinker driving device for pile knitting is provided to reduce the total size of a circular knitting machine by moving sinkers in an external diameter of a sinker bed by structure installed on an inner hollow part of a rotating cylinder. CONSTITUTION: A sinker driving device for pile knitting comprises the following: a sinker bed(210) installed on the bottom of an upper cylinder; a plurality of sinkers(310,320) which is individually moved according to each groove of the sinker bed; a pull cam(410) contacted to the rear end part of the sinker; an operating body(420) moving the pull cam; an operational axis(460) connected to the top of the operating body; an operating cylinder(450) dropping the operational axis; and an elastic member(430) lifting the operating body.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: GUIDE CAM FOR SINKER OF DOUBLE CYLINDER TYPE CIRCULAR KNITTING MACHINE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A guide cam for a sinker of a circular knitting machine of a double cylinder type is provided to correctly and minutely move an upper sinker, and to move the upper sinker in a vertical direction of a movement direction of a double-headed needle. CONSTITUTION: A guide cam for a sinker of a circular knitting machine of a double cylinder type includes the following: a first guide side(510); a second guide side(513) connected to one side of the first guide side through a first inclined surface; a third guide side(515) which is smaller than the second guide side, and is connected through the second guide side; a fourth guide side(517) which is bigger than the third guide, and is connected to one side of the third guide side; a fifth guide side(518) having the same radius with the fourth guide surface; and a sixth guide side(520) connected to the first inclined surface.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: BULB HOLDING CONSTRUCTION FOR AUTOMOBILE LAMP

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A bulb holding construction for an automobile lamp is provided to control the replacement of a bulb and inspection state by combining a bulb in a rear cap. CONSTITUTION: A housing(20) combines the lens and cover in front side of the housing. The housing comprises a threaded section(22) and a guide groove in rear side. A socket(40) is combined in a bulb and the front side. The socket comprises a packing(55) in the outer circumference. A cap(50) accepts the socket in the front side to make the socket is moved straightly. The cap is combined in the rear side to be rotatable.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: CONCENTRATING OPTICAL APPARATUS FOR SOLAR POWER SYSTEM AND SOLAR POWER SYSTEM BY USING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A concentrating optical apparatus for solar power system and a solar power system using the same are provided, which minimize light concentration loss domain and enhance optical focusing rate. CONSTITUTION: A Fresnel lens(110) has the predetermined focus. A first reflector(211) is separated from the Fresnel lens and is formed on the locus of the virtual first parabola having the same focus as the Fresnel lens. Second reflectors(212,213) are separated from the first parabola, are formed on the locus of the second parabola having the same focus as the first parabola, and are separated from the Fresnel lens and the first reflector.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: DEVICE AND METHOD FOR PRECODING BEAM BY CHANNEL SENSITIVE SCHEDULING IN WIRELESS COMMUNICATION SYSTEM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A device and a method for forming cooperation beam by channel sensitive scheduling in a wireless communication system are provided to newly define feedback structure and procedure for performing cooperation beam without using cooperation network structure. CONSTITUTION: A user reports information of CQI(Channel Quality Information) and PMI(Precoding Matrix Indication) to BS(Base Station) A(603). The user directly reports PMI information to BS B(653). The user does not want BS B to use the PMI information. The user reports information of CQI and PMI to the BS B(655). The BS A determines a scheduling and beam forming based on feedback information of MS(Mobile Station) a. The BS A transmits the scheduling with the bean forming as control information(657).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ADVERTISEMENT SIGNBOARD

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A cubic character channel advertisement signboard is provided, which can offer various backgrounds by placing a sheet between a background panel and an intermediate panel. CONSTITUTION: A frame member(1) unites a first square pipe(2) and a second square pipe(3) including an opening in one end using a screw and formed in a rectangular pattern. An intermediate panel(5) is inserted between the first square pipe and the second square pipe. A background panel(6) is attached to one side of the intermediate panel for the installation of a character panel(7).

exch:applicant-name.name: KOREA INSTITUTE OF GEOSCIENCE AND MINERAL RESOURCES(KIGAM)

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD FOR MANUFACTURING SILVER POWDER FROM SILVER INGOT

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method for manufacturing silver powder from a silver ingot is provided to prevent harmful effect to a human body by excluding a toxic reduction agent. CONSTITUTION: A method for manufacturing silver powder from a silver ingot comprises the steps of: adding strong nitric acid to a silver ingot and keeping a decomposition temperature to produce silver nitrate, adding sodium hydroxide solution to the silver nitrate to form silver oxide slurry, drying the silver oxide slurry to produce silver oxide powder, mixing the silver oxide powder with ceramic balls, and producing silver powder through thermal composition of the silver oxide powder.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD FOR CONNECTING TO WIRELESS LAN ACCESS POINT AND APPARATUS USING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method for connecting to a wireless LAN AP(Access Point) and a device using the same are provided to broadcast prob request signal according to the existence of appointed AP in close range, thereby reducing the power consumption caused by AP scan and AP connection. CONSTITUTION: A controller determines matching of MAC access of user designated AP list ad MAC address of a probe response signal(530). The controller calculates a distance between APs of the user designated AP list and present location of a mobile terminal(550). If user designated AP exist in close range from the present location, the controller broadcasts probe request signal(560,570). An AP transmits a probe response signal. The controller performs the access to the AP.

exch:applicant-name.name: DONG AH ELEC COMPONENTS CO LTD

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: AIR CONDITIONER USING THERMOELECTRIC MODULES

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An air conditioner for a vehicle using a thermoelectric element is provided to supply uniform cold air to inside a vehicle by stably maintaining the temperature of a thermoelectric element using cooling water. CONSTITUTION: An air conditioner for a vehicle using a thermoelectric element comprises a thermoelectric element(10), a first housing member(20), and a second housing member(30). A heat-absorbing surface is formed in one surface of the thermoelectric element, and a heat-radiating surface is formed in the other surface. The first housing member is in contact with the heat-absorbing surface of the thermoelectric element, and the second housing member is in contact with the heat- radiating surface of the thermoelectric element. A first sealed space is formed in the first housing member, and is filled with cooling water. A second sealed space is formed in the second housing member, and is filled with cooling member.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A FLOORCLOTH OF HEMP

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A mop is provided to replace a worn part and to produce a strong and lightweight structure, by manufacturing parts made of extruded aluminum and assembling the parts. CONSTITUTION: A mop comprises: a body which has a handle unit(10) and a cross bar(11); a lever; a floorcloth joining ring(4); and an elastic spring(2). An aluminum bar is manufactured by an extruded and shaped aluminum. The body, the lever, and the floorcloth joining ring are made by the aluminum bar which is cut and processed.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: COIL CAR WITH COIL TURNING ABILITY

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A coil car capable of coil turning is provided to minimize the processing time by changing the direction of a coil while transferring the coil to the next process. CONSTITUTION: A coil car capable of coil turning comprises a carriage(1) traveling along a guide rail, a base plate(2) installed in the carriage and raised/lowered by a lifting device installed in the carriage, a skid(3) installed on one side of the base plate to place a coil, and a rotating unit(20) which is installed in the base plate and rotates the skid.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR ELIMINATING INTER CELL INTERFERENCE IN A MULTIPLE INPUT MULTIPLE OUTPUT WIRELESS COMMUNICATION SYSTEM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A device and a method for eliminating inter cell interference in a multiple input multiple output wireless communication system are provided to control a PMI pattern of a BS according to the PMI desirability, thereby effectively performing interference elimination between BS cooperation cells. CONSTITUTION: An inter cell interference elimination device broadcast a PMI(Precoding Matrix Index) pattern of oneself and a PMI pattern least one of neighbor BS(303). The device confirms feedback information from the terminals(307). The device calculates the general favorable level of the terminals about the PMI patterns through PMI pattern favorable level of the feedback information. If the general favorable level is same or less than critical value, the device performs a PMI pattern switching process(311,313).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR CONTROLLING UNIVERSAL IC CARD(UICC) IN COMPLEX TERMINAL

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A device and a method for controlling UICC(Universal IC Card) in a complex terminal are provided to perform communication with UICC through interaction with controller in a plurality of communication modems, thereby maintaining the connection between a plurality of communication modem and the UICC. CONSTITUTION: An interface unit(150) transfers predetermined command for communication with UICC(Universal IC Card) form at least one of communication modems to a controller(140). The controller authorize communication right to the second communication(130) or return a given authorization right, or control the communication termination between the second communication modem and the UICC for maintaining connection between the UICC and the first communication modem(120) according to the UICC state. A MUX(Multiplexer)(110) connects the UICC with corresponding communication modem under the control of the controller.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR REDUCING POWER CONSUMPTION OF MOBILE STATION IN WIRELESS COMMUNICATION SYSTEM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A device and a method for reducing power consumption of a mobile terminal in a wireless communication system are provided to control scanning operation of the terminal about the UMA(Unlicensed Mobile Access) net according to the existence of UMA net in a operation range of the terminal, thereby preventing unnecessary scanning about UMA net. CONSTITUTION: If a UMA(Unlicensed Mobile Access) controller operates in a active mode, the UMA controller scans surrounding cells for acquisition of UMA net(101,103). If the UMA net confirms, the UMA controller confirms a mode switching signal from a GSM(Glocal System for Mobile Communications) controller of a terminal(105,107). If the mode switching signal is received, the UMA controller changes into a sleep mode(109). The mode switching signal is received the UMA controller changes into the UMA controller(113).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPLICATION OF NATURAL BIOPOLYMERS FOR INGREDIENTS OF DIET FOODS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A use of natural biopolymer as dietary food is provided to lower a value of saturated fat while enhancing human body immunity by adding scleroglucan and Schizophyllum commune beta - schizophyllan in dietary food. CONSTITUTION: The scleroglucan and Schizophyllum commune beta - schizophyllan are natural biopolymer. The natural biopolymer is used as dietary food. The scleroglucan of 0.1-90.0 weight% is used as the dietary food. The Schizophyllum commune beta - schizophyllan of 0.1-90.0 weight% is used as the dietary food. The cleroglucan and the Schizophyllum commune beta - schizophyllan of 0.1-90.0 weight are used as the dietary food at the same time.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR PROVIDING BROADCASTING SERVICE IN WIRELESS COMMUNICATION SYSTEM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A device and a method for providing broadcasting service in a wireless communication system are provided to assign two different layer of security key according to purchase data about charged service, thereby reinforcing the security about mobile broadcasting service. CONSTITUTION: A terminal confirms a stream tag about purchased data and two layer encryption key(203). The terminal confirms a stream tag of STKM(Short Term Key Message) streams in receivecd SDP(Session Description Protocol) signal(207). If SKTM stream exists, the terminal restores traffic authentication key by decoding the STKM stream(211). The STKM stream has a stream tag which is identical to a stream tag of broadcasting server. The terminal decodes a charged channel stream by the traffic authentication key(213).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A FUEL PUMP FOR A VEHICLE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A vehicle fuel pump is provided to prevent the formation of a fuel oil layer between a carbon brush and a commutator by keeping the initial contact pressure between the carbon brush and the commutator. CONSTITUTION: A vehicle fuel pump comprises a pair of cylindrical mounting parts(11) formed on a synthetic resin upper body(10) so that a pair of carbon brushes(20) are mounted thereon. A metal pole(30) is installed in the inner upper side of each mounting part above the carbon brush. The top of the carbon brush contacts with the metal pole while the bottom contacts with a commutator(60). A steel pipe(80) in which a coil is wound is fixed to the inner lower side of the mounting part. A spring(90) is installed between the metal pole and the steel pipe.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: FRAME DEVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A cubic character channel installing frame apparatus is provided, which can be transferred conveniently by reducing the volume thereof in carrying it. CONSTITUTION: An installing member(3) forma an installing frame of the rectangular shape by combining a plurality of horizontal pipes(4) and vertical pipes(10). A horizontal pipe is divided into a left side pipe(5) and a right side pipe(6). A vertical pipe is divided into an upper pipe and a lower pipe. A horizontal inner pipe is built-in inside the horizontal pipe. A vertical inner pipe is built-in inside the vertical pipe.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: LAUNDRY MACHINE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A washing apparatus is provided to enable a user to readily know the cycle operation time of a washing machine by forming a cycle indicating unit outside. CONSTITUTION: A washing apparatus(100) comprises a cabinet(110), a tub, a drum, an operation panel(160) and a cycle indicating unit(170). The cabinet forms the appearance of the washing apparatus. The operation panel and the cycle indicating unit are formed at the outer side of the cabinet. The cycle indicating unit indicates the lapse of the operation time of the washing apparatus with a certain volume. The cycle indicating unit is extended along the outer circumference of a door at the outer side of the cabinet.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD FOR DETECTING BASE LINE AND CHANNEL OF BIO DISK AND METHOD FOR DIAGNOSING HEALTH USING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method for detecting reference line and channel of a bio disk and a method for diagnosing health using the same are provided to simply perform health diagnosis and to enhance diagnosis accuracy. CONSTITUTION: A method for performing health diagnosing using a bio disk comprises: a step of centrifuging blood by controlling the bio disk to which blood is injected; a step of detecting diagnosis channel of the bio disk through pick-up of an optical drive; a step of processing to detectable data using detected data; and a step of recording the processed result.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: LDMOS TRANSISTOR AND MANUFACTURING METHOD FOR THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An LDMOS(lateral double MOS) transistor and a method of manufacture thereof are that N TOP domain along with P TOP domain is formed in the LOCOS bottom of the LDMOS so that the breakdown voltage and the on-resistance property are improved. CONSTITUTION: A source area(222) and a drain region(240) locate within the drift layer. A field insulating film(230) is formed within the drift layer between the drain region and the source area. An N TOP domain(250) is formed in the field insulating film bottom. A P TOP domain is formed in the bottom of N TOP domain.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SPIKE EMPLOYED PRESSING WHEEL ASSEMBLY FOR CONNECTING PIPES

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A spike for a gland assembly is provided to prevent the separation of a pipe by gripping the pipe with the fractured pieces when reduced by the inner inclined surface of a gland. CONSTITUTION: A spike(50) for a gland assembly is formed in a ring shape with a cut portion(51). A plurality of edge claws(52) are formed in the inner surface of the spike. The outer surface of the spike is inclined. The spike is composed of a plurality of split pieces(55a,55b,55c,55d,55e,55f) that are connected with connection parts(56a,56b,56c,56d,56e). Slits(57a,57b,57c,57d,57e) are formed between the connected pieces.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SPIKE EMPLOYED PRESSING WHEEL ASSEMBLY FOR CONNECTING PIPES

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A spike for a gland assembly is provided to prevent a deformed pipe separating from a gland assembly by gripping the pipe with split pieces of a wire ring. CONSTITUTION: A spike(50) for a gland assembly comprises a plurality of slit pieces(60,60a,60b,60c,60d,60e,60f) formed on a wire ring(51) with a cut part(52), edge claws(61,62) for gripping a pipe within the split pieces, an inner mounting groove(63) arranged between the edge claws and fit to the wire ring, an outer elongated groove(66) formed along the circumference on the exterior inclined surface of the split piece, and an elastic band(70) installed in the outer elongated groove of the split piece.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: CENTRALIZED CUTTING FLUID AUTO SUPPLEMENT SYSTEM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A centralized automatic cutting fluid supplement system is provided to prevent the interruption of an operation or damage to a machine resulting from depletion of cutting fluid. CONSTITUTION: A centralized automatic cutting fluid supplement system mixes and dilutes cutting fluid in a centralized manner, and supplies the mixed cutting fluid to a storage tank(10) of an individual machine tool through a feed line(7). A ball-top valve(11) is installed in the storage tank in order to keep a uniform water level in the storage tank.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ICE CUP HOLDER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An ice cup holder is provided to maintain original taste of content of a cup by preventing the content from being diluted due to molten ice and to enable a user to drink alcoholic beverage while maintaining coldness. CONSTITUTION: An ice cup holder comprises: a lid(1); a container(5) capable of containing water; and an insulation case which is capable of contacting content except for only the upper side of the container after freezing the content. The lid is convexly formed to the outer circumference of the upper side of the container when covering the container with the lid and the lower part of the lid is convexly formed.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR GENERATING CONTINUOUSLY ENVIRONMENTALLY FRIENDLY CLEAN ELECTRIC POWER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An apparatus and a method for generating continuously environmentally-friendly clean electric power using the falling of a weight are provided to enable continuous power generation at any place by lifting up a falling weight and then dropping the weight again. CONSTITUTION: An apparatus for generating continuously environmentally-friendly clean electric power using the falling of a weight comprises a weight being dropped from a predetermined height, a guide unit(20) defining the falling path of the weight, a lift connected to the end of the guide unit to return the falling weight to the predetermined height, first and second compression units(40a,40b) protruding from the guide unit and pressed by the weight to be lowered, link units(82,84,86) connecting the compression units so that one of the compression units is raised when the other is lowered, and a generator unit(50) which generates electricity by the down motion of the compression unit.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A REFRIGERATOR

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A refrigerator is provided to prevent damage to a mark part with patterns, and to improve the exterior by embedding a decorative panel in a transparent basket. CONSTITUTION: A refrigerator(1) comprises a main body(10), a door(14), baskets(20), and decorative panels(300). The main body has a storage space for storing food. The door is movably formed in the main body, and selectively opens and closes the storage space. The baskets are coupled to a door liner which forms the rear surface of the door. A part of the baskets is transparent. The decorative panels are installed in the baskets.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD FOR AUTOMATICALLY EXECUTING A APPLICATION DEPENDENT ON DISPLAY'S AXIS CHANGE IN MOBILE COMMUNICATION TERMINAL AND MOBILE COMMUNICATION TERMINAL THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method for automatically performing an application dependent on change of displays axis in a mobile communication terminal and a mobile communication terminal thereof are provided to automatically perform an application for horizontal view mode which is automatically predetermined at horizontal view mode of display. CONSTITUTION: If a display unit is a horizontal view mode state, a mobile communication terminal starts to photograph through a camera(320). An image processing unit analyzes a photographed image(330). If the face is acknowledged, the mobile communication determines a horizontal view mode of a display unit(340,350). The display unit rotates at counterclockwise direction in horizontal view mode. The mobile communication terminal performs an application for watching digital broadcasting(360).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR GENERATING ENVIRONMENTALLY FRIENDLY CLEAN ELECTRIC POWER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An apparatus and a method for generating continuously environmentally-friendly clean electric power using the falling of a weight and a lift are provided to enable continuous power generation by employing as assistant power the natural power such as wind force, fluidic force, and elastic force. CONSTITUTION: An apparatus and a method for generating continuously environmentally-friendly clean electric power comprises a weight(10), a guide unit(20), a lift(30), a power supply unit, a plurality of compression units(40) and a generator unit(50). The weight falls from a predetermined height. The guide unit defines the falling path of the weight. The lift is connected to the end of the guide unit and returns the falling weight to the predetermined height. The power supply unit transfers power to the lift in order to return the weight to the predetermined height. The compression units protrude from the surface of the guide unit and pressed with the weight to be lowered. The generator unit generates electricity by the down motion of the compression unit.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PHOTORESIST COMPOSITION

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A photoresist composition is provided to improve the resolution, the development contrast, the adhesive force, the photosensitive speed, the remaining rate of a film, and the heat resistance. CONSTITUTION: A photoresist composition contains an alkali-soluble resin, a photo sensitive compound, a colloid phase inorganic material and an organic solvent. 1~50 wt% of colloid phase inorganic material is mixed for the sum of total amounts of the alkali-soluble resin and the photo sensitive compound. 5~50 parts of photo sensitive compound by weight is mixed for the 100 parts of alkali-soluble resin and the colloid phase inorganic material by weight. 10~50wt% of organic solvent is mixed for the total amount of the total composition.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: UPPER SUPPORTING STRUCTURE FOR TIMBER BRIDGE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An upper supporting structure of a timber leg is provided to enable a user to easily install the upper supporting structure of the timber leg and to enable the user to strongly install the upper supporting structure without a welding work. CONSTITUTION: An upper supporting structure of a timber leg comprises: a section steel beam(1) which is continuously arranged and forms the upper supporting structure; and a width supporting board(2) which is connected to an support end of the upper part of the section steel beam. A connection head having inserting recess is formed on both ends of the width supporting board. The connection head of both ends is connected to a width main body.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: HEAT PUMP SYSTEM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A heat pump system is provided to simultaneously supply hot water and cold air in the summer time, and to simultaneously supply hot water and hot air in the winter time. CONSTITUTION: A heat pump system comprises a compressor(1), a condenser, an expansion valve, an evaporator, a four-way valve(5), an outdoor unit system(300), an indoor unit system(400), and a heat storing system(500). The outdoor unit system has heat exchangers(40,41), an indoor unit(2), an expansion valve, control valves(30,31,32,33,34), and a liquid receiver(6). The indoor unit system comprises an indoor unit(3), is operated by cold air and hot air. The heat storing system stores hot water and heating water in water pumps(10,11) and water tanks(7,8), and is selectively operated when necessary.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: HOT WATER HEAT PUMP SYSTEM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A hot water heat pump system is provided to simultaneously supply hot water and cold air in the summer time, and to simultaneously supply hot water, heating water, and hot air in the winter time. CONSTITUTION: A hot water heat pump system comprises a compressor(1), a condenser, an expansion valve, an evaporator, a four-way valve(6), an outdoor unit system(300), and an indoor unit system(400). The compressor compresses and discharges refrigerant gas. The condenser condenses the compressed refrigerant. The expansion valve expands the high-temperature and high-pressure liquid refrigerant into low-pressure liquid refrigerant. The evaporator returns the refrigerant to the compressor. The outdoor unit system selectively operates heat exchangers(40,41) installed between the compressor and the four-way valve. The indoor unit system comprises an indoor unit(3), and is operated by cold air and hot air.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: DUAL MONITOR PROVIDING DEVICE HAVING DISPLAY CONVERSION FUNCTION

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A dual monitor providing device having a display conversion function is provided to supply a reliable consultation service by displaying the screen content of a staff monitor through a customer monitor. CONSTITUTION: A first video signal output port(32) outputs an external video signal through a video signal input port(31). A multimedia data reproduction unit(35) creates an internal video signal through the reproduction of stored multimedia data. After switching the internal video signal and the external video signal, a switching unit(34) outputs an internal video signal and the external video signal. A second video signal output port(33) outputs an outputted video signal of the switching unit.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A METHOD FOR CONSTRUCTING ASSEMBLY WALL AND ASSEMBLY WALL CONSTRUCTED BY THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A waterproof protrusion integrated assembly wall and a construction method thereof are provided to prevent damage to the assembly wall by preventing a gypsum board from being rotten. CONSTITUTION: A construction method of a waterproof protrusion integrated assembly wall is as follows. A floor frame(10) with a first opening(11) is fixed to the bottom. A ceiling frame(30) with a third opening(31) is fixed to the ceiling. A side wall frame(20) is installed in the first and third openings, and forms a wall frame. A waterproof protrusion(40) is adhered to the side wall frame and the floor frame. Multiple first fixing pieces(P1) are fixed to the side wall frame and the floor frame through the waterproof protrusion. A gypsum board(50) is adhered to the side wall frame and the ceiling frame. Multiple second fixing pieces(P2) are fixed to the side wall frame and the ceiling frame through the gypsum board.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A CONSTRUCTION METHOD AND STRUCTURE FOR WATERPROOF USING ASPHALT WATERPROOF SHEET

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A waterproof construction method using an asphalt waterproof sheet and a waterproof structure are provided to prevent a waterproof sheet from being got loose by preventing a gap from being generated. CONSTITUTION: A waterproof construction method using an asphalt waterproof sheet is as follows. An asphalt primer layer(11) is formed by spreading asphalt primer on the front surface of a floor(10). A first asphalt layer(12) is formed on the top of the asphalt primer layer by spreading molten asphalt. An asphalt waterproof sheet(S) and another asphalt waterproof sheet(S') are arranged on the first asphalt layer to be separated from each other. A second asphalt layer(13) is formed to cover the top of the first asphalt layer by spreading molten asphalt. A vinyl(14) is attached on the top surface of the second asphalt layer.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: RADIO FREQUENCY IDENTIFICATION SYSTEM FOR CONTROLLING OUTPUT OF POWER OF RADIO FREQUENCY SIGNAL ACCORDING TO HUMIDITY AND CONTROL METHOD IN THE RADIO FREQUENCY IDENTIFICATION SYSTEM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A radio frequency identification system for controlling the output of power of a radio frequency signal according to humidity, and a control method in the same are provided to maintain and change the recognition distance of an RF signal efficiently according to the physical amount by determining the output of the RF signal based on the measure physical amount. CONSTITUTION: An RFID(Radio Frequency IDentification) system includes a sensor unit, a control unit(120) and an RFID reader unit(200). The RFID reader unit comprises an output control unit(201) and an RF signal transmitter(202). Based on the output information of the control unit, the output control unit controls the output of the RF signal. The RF signal transmitter transmits the RF signal at a controlled output. Based on the physical amount of the sensor unit, the output of the RF signal is determined by the control unit.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD FOR OPENING THE DOOR WHICH THE CONFIRMATION OF THE REFRIGERATOR

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method for confirming whether a door of a refrigerator is opened is provided to enable a user to easily and visually confirm an opened state or a closed state of a door of a refrigerator. CONSTITUTION: A method for confirming whether a door of a refrigerator is opened is as follows. It is determined whether a door is temporarily opened or whether the door is continuously opened(ST110). A display window is lightened depending on the opened state of the door(ST200). A user confirms a current state of the door.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: TUBE FOR PROTECTING ELECTRIC WIRE AND ITS ARRANGEMENT TRAY

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An electric wire protection tube and an arrangement tray thereof are provided to prevent an electric shock by contacting the inner wall of a first protection unit with the surface of the electric wire. CONSTITUTION: An electric wire protection tube includes a first protection unit(120), a block unit(160), and a second protection unit(140). The first protection unit has a ring shape. The inner wall of the first protection unit is contacted with the surface of the electric wire. A gap is positioned on an arbitrary position of the first protection unit. The block unit blocks the gap after the electric wire is inserted into the first protection unit. The second protection unit has the same shape as the first protection unit. The second protection unit is mounted on the outer wall of the first protection unit to surround the block unit.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: NEAR INFRARED RAY ABSORBER CONTAINING DITHIOL METAL COMPLEX, MANUFACTURING METHOD OF DITHIOL METAL COMPLEX, OPTICAL FILTER COMPRISING THEM AND SUN PROTECTION FILTER CONTAINING NEAR INFRARED RAY ABSORBER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A near infrared ray containing a novel dithiol metal complex compound and an optical filter and thermal infrared ray shield filter are provided to absorb wavelength light and to produce an improved plasma display panel. CONSTITUTION: A dithiol metal complex compound with improved solubility is denote by chemical formula 1. In chemical formula 1, M is nickel, palladium, or platinum; R is hydrogen, alkyl group of C1-C6 or ether group of C1-C6; x is hydrogen or halogen; and m is 1-3. The dithiol metal complex compound is substituted. The dithiol metal complex compound is nickel.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ROTATING TYPE GROUND ANCHOR

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A rotating type anchor is provided to obtain a large tensile force by securely fixing the anchor regardless of a ground state, and to reduce costs required for installing the anchor. CONSTITUTION: A rotating type anchor comprises a connecting pin(9), a fixing wing(10), and a plate spreader(11). The connecting pin is formed in a guide bar(8) of the front end of the anchor. The fixing wing is coupled to the connecting pin. The plate spreader is coupled to one surface of the guide bar, and rotates the fixing wing. A spreader fixing groove is formed in one front end of the fixing wing. A spreader fixing pin(13) is formed in a connecting socket(7), and is coupled to the spreader coupling groove.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: OPENING-AND-SHUTTING-TYPE PLANT CULTIVATION CONTAINER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A manufacturing method of a seedling raising pot of an opening/shutting type is provided to promote absorption of moisture and nutrients for growing roots of plants by removing an opening/shutting device on the seedling raising pot. CONSTITUTION: A manufacturing method of a seedling raising pot of an opening/shutting type includes the following: an opening part(13) promoting growth of plants; an absorption part(11); a suction part(12) absorbing water; a cover(20) blocking outflow of moisture of a container(10) to the outside; and an opening/shutting device securing the opening part. The container is filled with filling materials(30) such as soil, bed soil, nutrients and moisturizer etc. The filling materials are received in water-soluble vinyl.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: HANGUL INPUT APPARATUS AND HANGUL INPUT METHOD USING TOUCH SCREEN

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A Hangeul input apparatus and a Hangeul input method using a touch screen are provided to reduce the number of touches required for the input of double consonants by additionally installing a double consonant input key. CONSTITUTION: A first consonant input unit has 4 keys for 4 basic Korean consonants (giyug, nieun, digeud, rieul), and 3 keys for 3 basic Korean consonants(mieum, bieub, siok) are araranged on a second consonant input unit. A third consonant input unit has 3 keys for 3 basic Korean consonants(ieung, gieuk, hieuk). A double consonant input unit(227) converts the consonants, giyug, digeud, bieub, siok and gieuk into double consonants thereof.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A PILLAR ELASTICITY ADJUSTMENT MAKE USE OF FISHHOOK POLE A FRAME SUPPORT

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An elastic pillar used in a holder frame of a fishing pole is provided to enable a user to easily manufacture by simplifying an elastic structure and to safely and rapidly control the elasticity of the fishing pole. CONSTITUTION: An elastic pillar used in a holder frame of a fishing pole comprises an inner pillar(1) and an outer pillar(2) in which the inner pillar is inserted. The inner pillar comprises: a barrier groove(10) which is included on the upper part of the inner pillar; a projection(11) which is formed on the circumferential surface of the inner pillar; and a cone auger portion(12) which is formed on the lower part of the inner pillar. The outer pillar comprises: a screw type globe(21) which is included on the lower part of a hollow pipe(20); a connection pipe(22) including a male screw on the upper part of the connection pipe; a female screw(23a) which is included on a hollow union pipe(23) of a cone shape; a spring(24) which is accepted in the inner side of the hollow union pipe; and an inner pillar fixture(25).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: DEVICE FOR REMOVING IMPURITIES

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A dust collector is provided to easily discharge dust using the weight of the dust and the collision force of a protector, and to prevent damage to a filter using a protector. CONSTITUTION: A dust collector comprises a protector unit(200), a filter unit(300), and a fan unit(500). The protector unit has a dust suction port(210), a dust discharge port(230), and a protector(220). The dust suction port inhales dust generated when a drill rod is excavated. The dust discharge port discharges the dust to outside. The protector guides the dust to the dust discharge port. The filter unit filters air inhaled through the dust suction port and the protector unit. The fan unit generates pressure for inhaling the dust.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: DEVICE FOR CONNECTING THE POWER OF PUMP USING IN COOLING SYSTEM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A power transfer device for a pump in a cooling system of an internal combustion engine is provided to enable stable axial motion of a movable member because the movable member is coupled with pins installed along the axis of a drive shaft. CONSTITUTION: A power transfer device for a pump in a cooling system of an internal combustion engine comprises insertion holes(18a), pins(14a), and an elastic element(20). The insertion holes are formed at regular intervals about a drive shaft(10a) along the circumference of a movable member(18). The pins with one end integrally fixed to a hub(14) are installed in parallel with the axis of the drive shaft corresponding to the insertion holes. The pins coupled with the movable member guide a motion for contact and separation to a pulley(12). The elastic element is provided to each pin to return the movable member to the pulley.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR PROVIDING SEARCH SERVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method and a system for providing a search service are provided to reflect a symbol of a user to a search result in real time by using input windows of equalizer format. CONSTITUTION: A search server receives keywords(S810), and calculates an index according to a selected standard. The search server obtains the information related to the keywords(S820), and determines the priority for the information on the keywords(S830). Based on the determined priority, the search server arranges the information(S840). The search server provides a user terminal with the information via a network(S850).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: GERMANIUM PHOTODETECTOR AND METHOD OF FORMING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: In germanium light detector and a method of formation thereof is the low vacuum state, the germanium epitaxial layer is formed without the buffer layer and annealing process. The substrate and process cost relatively offer the cheap germanium light detector. CONSTITUTION: A first doped layer(110) is formed on the substrate(100). An amorphous germanium layer(121) is formed on the first doped layer. The amorphous germanium layer is crystallized in the warming process. The germanium epitaxial layer(130) is formed on the crystallized germanium layer as described above. The second doped layer is formed on the germanium epitaxial layer.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SUBSTRATE PROCESSING SYSTEM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A substrate processing system stands in line the location of substrate through the rotation of align eccentric cap. The damage of substrate by the misalignment is prevented. CONSTITUTION: A loading chamber(LC) loads substrate. An unloading chamber(ULC) unloads the substrate provided from the transfer chamber(TC) to outside. At least, 2 processing chambers(PC1, PC2) are arranged in order to be each other opposite to the inline type. The transfer chamber is arranged between the processing chamber.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ISOLATION VALVE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: The isolation valve arranges the pumping line and vacuum line in order to be contiguous to the lower part of the first housing. The damage of the bellows by the reacting gas remaining behind in the process inside of chamber is prevented fundamentally. CONSTITUTION: A first housing(100) comprises the pumping line(110) connected to the vacuum pump and the vacuum line(120) connected to the processing chamber. The second housing(200) at the same time opens and closes the pumping line and vacuum line. It evens, the pumping line and vacuum line are formed. The second housing comprises the bellows which at the same time opens and closes the pumping line and vacuum line.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: MUSIC ARRANGEMENT PRACTICING NOTEBOOK PAPER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A notebook paper for practicing music arrangement is provided to solve inconvenience that a user directly draws a name of musical instrument and a clef by printing the name of the musical instrument and the clef on a manuscript paper. CONSTITUTION: A notebook paper for practicing music arrangement helps a user to learn music arrangement and manufacture the notepaper for practicing the music arrangement by printing a name of each musical instrument and a clef on a blank music paper note for practicing the music arrangement. The notebook paper enables the user to reduce time of writing the name of musical instrument and the clef.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: OUTDOOR UNIT OF AIR CONDITIONER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An outdoor unit of an air conditioner is provided to easily perform an installation work and a repairing work by stably maintaining a control box, and to minimize corrosion of components in the outdoor unit. CONSTITUTION: An outdoor unit of an air conditioner comprises an outer case, a fan motor assembly, a compressor, a heat exchanger, a partition(40), a control box(60), and a water inflow preventing part(61). The fan motor assembly is installed inside the outer case, and inhales and discharges external air. The compressor compresses a refrigerant. The heat exchanger heat-exchanges the external air with the refrigerant. The partition divides an inner space of the outer case into a blowing area for the fan motor assembly and a device area for the compressor. The control box is installed in the partition, and controls the operation of the fan motor assembly and the compressor. The water inflow preventing part prevents condensation water generated in the heat exchanger from being scattered to the device area.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: OUTDOOR UNIT OF AIR CONDITIONER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An outdoor unit of an air conditioner is provided to rapidly discharge condensation water generated in a heat exchanger, and to rapidly defrost when the condensation water is frozen using a heater. CONSTITUTION: An outdoor unit of an air conditioner comprises a heat exchanger and a base fan. The heat exchanger heat-exchanges the external air with a refrigerant. The base fan is installed in the bottom of the heat exchanger, and has a condensation water drain hole(568). Condensation water generated in the surface of the heat exchanger is discharged through the condensation water drain hole. A heater(569) is inserted between the bottom end of the heat exchanger and the base fan.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: OUTDOOR UNIT OF AIR CONDITIONER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An outdoor unit of an air conditioner is provided to easily perform an assembly work by guiding a motor fixing unit to be located in a set-up position, and to protect the interior of the outdoor unit. CONSTITUTION: An outdoor unit(10) of an air conditioner comprises a heat exchanger(25), a fan(31), a motor(33), a motor fixing unit(35), a base fan, and a guide unit. The heat exchanger heat-exchanges the external air with a refrigerant. The fan flows the external air. The motor powers the fan. The motor fixing unit is coupled to the top surface of the base fan. The guide unit guides the motor fixing unit to be located in a set-up position.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: OUTDOOR UNIT OF AIR CONDITIONER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An outdoor unit of an air conditioner is provided to accurately sense outdoor temperature by minimizing the influence of condensation water, and to prevent a heat exchanger from being in contact with a wire. CONSTITUTION: An outdoor unit of an air conditioner comprises a case, a suction grill, a heat exchanger(25), a fan, and a temperature sensor(593). The suction grill is formed in one side of the case, and inhales external air. The heat exchanger is formed inside the case, and heat-exchanges the external air with a refrigerant. The fan is formed inside the case, and inhales the external air. The temperature sensor is installed in the suction grill to be separated from the heat exchanger, and senses the temperature the inhaled external air.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: OUTDOOR UNIT OF AIR CONDITIONER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An outdoor unit of an air conditioner is provided to easily couple and separate a top case by gripping a grip of the top case, and to efficiently install and repair inner components without separating an outer case. CONSTITUTION: An outdoor unit of an air conditioner comprises an outer case, a compressor, a heat exchanger, a fan, a top case(55), and a grip(551). The compressor is accepted in the outer case, and compresses a refrigerant. The heat exchanger heat-exchanges the refrigerant exhausted from the compressor with external air. The fan inhales the external air. The top case forms the top surface of the outer case. The grip is formed in one side of the top case, and is protruded from the side end of the top case.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: OUTDOOR UNIT OF AIR CONDITIONER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An outdoor unit of an air conditioner is provided to effectively discharge condensation water generated when a refrigerant is evaporated using surface tension. CONSTITUTION: An outdoor unit of an air conditioner comprises an outer case, a base fan, a heat exchanger, a pipe cover(58), a water collecting unit(586). The base fan forms the bottom surface of the outer case. The heat exchanger is installed in the base fan. The pipe cover is attached on one surface of the outer case, and covers a pipe connected to the heat exchanger. The water collecting unit is horizontally extended from the inner side of the pipe cover, and collects condensation water from the pipe.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: HOT WATER SUPPLY DEVICE FOR MAT

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A hot water supply apparatus for a mat is provided to efficiently transfer heat to circulating water by employing a plate-shaped heater attached to the bottom surface of a water tank. CONSTITUTION: A hot water supply apparatus for a mat comprises a hollow box(10), a water tank, a circulating pump, a pipe line and a heater. The circulating pump comprising a pump inlet port and a pump outlet port is installed inside the box. The pipe line includes a guide pipe connecting the pump inlet port and a circulating water outlet port, a discharge pipe connected to the pump outlet port, and a return pipe connected to a circulating water inlet port. The heater of plate shape indirectly contacts with circulating water flowing through the pipe line and the water tank by being installed in a heater mounting surface of a water tank housing.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: AIR CONDITIONER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An air-conditioner is conveniently provided to selectively connect to one of an indoor unit and an outdoor unit. CONSTITUTION: Air-conditioner comprises an indoor unit(80) and an outdoor unit(10). The indoor unit comprises an indoor heat exchanger and a terminal block. The indoor heat exchanger exchanges heat between refrigerant and indoor air. The terminal block comprises a power supply connector in which the wire for the electric power supply is connected. The outdoor unit comprises an outdoor heat exchanger and the terminal block. The terminal block comprises the power supply connector. The terminal block of the indoor unit and terminal block of the outdoor unit are electrically connected. The wire for the electric power supply is selectively connected to the terminal block of the terminal block of the indoor unit or the outdoor unit.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: HOT WATER PASSAGE CONTROL VALVE FOR HOT WATER HEAT MAT AND MAT THEREWITH

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A flow path control valve for a hot water mat and a hot water mat including the same are provided to select the heating area and calorific value of the mat using the flow path control valve for selecting a hot water flow path with one or both sides of a main circulation tube. CONSTITUTION: A flow path control valve for a hot water mat comprises an inlet valve body, an inlet rotary plate, a rotary knob(62), an outlet valve body, an outlet rotary plate and a rotary plate interlock unit. The inlet valve body is installed in a hot water source connection unit, having an outer circulation inlet port and a pair of inner circulation outlet port. The inlet rotary plate is arranged inside the inlet valve body in order to divide the internal space of the inlet valve body into two sections. The rotary knob rotates the inlet rotary plate. The outlet valve body is installed in the hot water source connection unit, having an outer circulation outlet port and a pair of inner circulation inlet ports. The outlet rotary plate is arranged inside the outlet valve body in order to divide the internal space of the outlet valve body into two sections. The rotary plate interlock unit rotates the outlet rotary plate.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: DISPLAY DEVICE AND METHOD FOR DISPLAYING OF DEMO IMAGE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A display device and a method for displaying of a demo image are provided to display a demo image by producing a stream for image quality demonstration and storing the demonstration at a display device. CONSTITUTION: A demo image is specialized to feature by model. Based on the stored model information of a memory unit(20), a control unit(40) searches a demo image corresponding to the feature of a corresponding model among the demo images stored at a demo image storage unit(10). An OSD(On Screen Display) generation unit(50) generates creates a list of a searched demo image. A display unit(70) displays the demo image list of the OSD format.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD AND AUDIO SIGNAL OUTPUT CIRCIUT OF DISPLAY DEVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An audio signal output device of a display device is provided to supply a stable voice output function by adopting an output gain value according to the voice transmission method of an inputted voice signal. CONSTITUTION: A broadcasting system decision unit(20) detects a video carrier frequency and an image carrier frequency from a received broadcasting signal of a broadcasting signal receiver(10), and a voice transmission type decision unit(30) discriminates the voice transmission method of the corresponding voice signal of a decided broadcasting system according to a decided broadcasting system. A control unit(50) changes a preset output gain value according to a decided voice transmission type. A voice signal compensation unit(60) compensates the voice signal of the inputted broadcasting signal through the outputted gain value.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS FOR RECORDING BROADCAST IN IPTV AND METHOD THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An apparatus for recording broadcast in an IPTV and a method thereof are provided to freely use the storage space of a personal computer as the storage space of a TV by transmitting data through a network environment. CONSTITUTION: A storage unit(20) stores certain broadcast data among received broadcasting data of a receiving unit(10), and a storage event is generated for certain broadcasting data. According to the comparison of a residual storage space with the capacity of broadcasting data to be stored, a control unit(30) secures a storage space of the broadcasting data to be stored through the external transmission of the stored broadcasting data. A data transmission unit(40) transmits the stored broadcasting data to the outside.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR MONITORING OF BROADCAST VIEW

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method and an apparatus for monitoring of a broadcast view are provided to restrict the watching of a harmful program for a juvenile or a child by monitoring harmful program watching in real time. CONSTITUTION: A frame memory unit(20) stores received image data of a data receiving unit(10), and an image signal processor(30) processes the image data. A control unit(60) senses image data transmission timing according to preset data transmission conditions. The control unit controls the transmission of image data to a pre-registered external device(100). A data transmission unit(70) transmits the image data to the external device.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: DISPLAY APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR ZOOMING IMAGE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A display apparatus and method for zooming an image are provided to confirm a currently-selected portion by simultaneously an original screen and the expanded screen. CONSTITUTION: A display unit(20) displays a main screen image, and an extension region selector(30) selects a certain expansion region from a main image. According to a preset extension ratio, a sub screen processor(40) process the sub screen image of a selected extension region. A control unit(50) determines the position of the display of a sub image. Based on the position of the display, the control unit displays the image of a sub screen in a predetermined region.

exch:applicant-name.name: HYUN DAI HEAVY IND CO LTD

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SPRAY MORTAR INSULATION FOR ENGINE ROOM, DECK HOUSE WALL AND PIPE IN ALL VESSEL

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A spray mortar composition for a ship is provided to secure the soundproof property, a non-combustible property, and an insulation efficiency of a heat-retaining area of the ship. CONSTITUTION: A heat-retaining and nonflammable spray mortar composition for a ship is sprayed to a heat-retaining area of the ship. The composition contains 10~20wt% of sodium silicate, 5~10wt% of silicate, 10~20wt% of white cement, 3~6wt% of prohexa silicate, 2~5wt% of aluminum hydroxide, and 60~70wt% of vermiculite. A thermal insulation construction process using the spray mortar composition comprises the following steps: forming spray mortar(10); mixing the spray mortar in a spray pump; and spraying the spray mortar to a heat-retaining area including a wall(20) or a pipe(30).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR DISPLAYING

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A display device and a method thereof are provided to supply a high quality image by excluding the noises of a frame edge portion from a screen according to motion prediction and motion tracking. CONSTITUTION: A frame compensation unit(130) generates an insert frame according to motion variation between frames, and a control unit(140) inserts the insert frame between a previous frame and a current frame. The control unit displays the frames on a display unit(150), and the frame compensation unit generates the insert frame corresponding to the motion variation.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: COMPOSITION FOR FORMING OVERCOAT LAYER AND SEMICONDUCTOR DIVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A composition for forming an overcoat layer is provided to form a desired pattern on the overcoat layer, and to improve the transmissivity, the thermal stability, and the planarity of the overcoat layer. CONSTITUTION: A composition for forming an overcoat layer contains 100 parts of photosensitive resin by weight, 200~800 parts of photopolymerizable monomer by weight, and 10~100 parts of photo initiator by weight. The photosensitive resin is formed with a copolymer including 20~60wt% of unsaturated carboxylic acid, 10~30wt% of acrylic monomer, and 20~50wt% of aromatic monomer. The unsaturated carboxylic acid is selected from the group consisting of acrylic acid, methacrylic acid, crotonic acid, maleic acid and others.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: CODONOPIS LANCEOLATA TEA OF TEABAG-TYPE AND MANUFACTURING PROCESS THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A codonopis lanceolata tea bag and a manufacturing method thereof are provided to make health beverage containing codonopis lanceolata components which are beneficial to a body by making codonopis lanceolata tea with a tea bag. CONSTITUTION: A manufacturing method of a codonopis lanceolata tea bag includes the following steps: removing foreign materials on the surface of codonopis lanceolata; steaming the codonopis lanceolata with steam for 30 ~ 180 minutes in 70-140°C; drying codonopis lanceolata for 5 ~ 72 hours; crushing codonopis lanceolata with a size of 0.05-1 cm; parching the crushed codonopis lanceolata in 60-100°C for 5 ~ 180 minutes; and wrapping the parched codonopis lanceolata in a tea bag.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: THE METHOD AND SYSTEM TO ENLARGE THE SALE OF THE BEVERAGE THROUGH AN ATMOSPHERE CREATION

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method and a system for promoting beverage sales by making an atmosphere are provided to output characteristic sounds using an RFID tag attached to a beverage container, thereby making a good drinking party atmosphere. CONSTITUTION: If the weight of beverage is reduced, informaton of an RFID tag in which various different voice information is stored is stored in a database. If the beverage to which the RFID tag is attached is delivered to a store, a promoting device in the store is mounted in a beverage container.
