The RFID tag information is offered to a customer while the RFID tag information is read. The promoting device reads the RFID tag information to execute various different voice services accordign to weight of beverage remaining in the beverage container.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: FUEL-SAVING DEVICE BY MEANS OF MAGNETIC FIELD

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A fuel-saving device using a magnetic field is provided to improve the combustion efficiency of fuel and reduce the exhaustion of smoke by decomposing paraffin or scales coagulated around the fuel. CONSTITUTION: A fuel-saving device using a magnetic field comprises a bottom-open case(10) of plastic material including an inner space(S), a plurality of rear earth magnets(50a,50b) installed in the inner space of the case, a surface contact unit(30) of plastic material which contacts with fuel by closing the bottom of the case, and a magnetic field shielding part(20) which is interposed between the inner surface of the case and the rear earth magnets inside the case.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR ACF PACKAGING USING LASER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: By using laser, the anisotropic conductive film device of packaging and the method using laser bond the anisotropic conductive film. The reliability and accuracy of the process are improved. CONSTITUTION: An optical source section(100) generates the laser having the fixed wavelength. The irradiation portion(200) examines the laser created from the optical source section in the upper side of the substrate(10). A presser portion(300) sanctions pressure in the substrate upside in which the laser irradiation is completed. The irradiation portion comprises the galvanometer scanner for examining laser in the upper side of substrate and polygon scanner, at least, one.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SEMICONDUCTOR DEVICE AND METHOD FOR MANUFACTURING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A semiconductor device and a manufacturing method thereof are provided to improve the quality of the semiconductor device by depositing an HTO layer on the front side of the substrate and the inner side of the trench. CONSTITUTION: A semiconductor substrate has a trench. A lining nitride layer is formed on the semiconductor substrate and the inside of the trench. An HTO layer(124) is deposited on the lining nitride layer. An insulation layer is formed on the semiconductor substrate to include the inside of the trench. A device isolation layer(126a) is formed by planarizing a gap-fill insulation layer.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: DUAL PLANT CULTIVATION CONTAINER AND MANUFACTURING METHOD FOR ROOT OBSERVATION

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A manufacturing method of a double plant-cultivation container for observing roots of plants is provided to observe change of roots while cultivating plants by using phototropism and geotropism of the plants. CONSTITUTION: A double plant-cultivation container for observing roots of plants comprises an internal tube container(20) and an external tube container(10). The internal tube container includes an opening part(23) used for cultivating plants and an absorbing part(21) absorbing water. The internal container is formed with a transparent material. The external tube container includes an opening part(12) and an absorbing part(11). The external tube container is formed with an opaque material. A cover(22) is mounted to block outflow of moisture in the internal tube container.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ROTATION-TYPE PLANT CULTIVATION CONTAINER AND MANUFACTURING METHOD FOR ROOT OBSERVATION

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A manufacturing method of a plant-cultivation container of a rotary type is provided to observe growth of roots without obstruction in growth of the plants through an open part of an opaque rotating part. CONSTITUTION: A manufacturing method of a plant-cultivation container of a rotary type includes a container(20), a rotating part(10) of which a part is opened and rotated while surrounding the container, and a cover(23) blocking outflow of moisture in the container. The container includes an opening part(24), a suction part(22) absorbing water, and an opaque part(21) preventing penetration of light. A transparent part of the container and the opening part of the rotating part are on the same part.

PURPOSE: A puddle lamps for vehicles is provided to improve the recognition and luminous intensity by adjusting a light in various angle through a multi-step bending part outside a conical transparent lens. CONSTITUTION: A conical shape transparent lens(2) is bent at the outer circumference of a lamp housing, in a multi-stage. The reflection mirror(4) has a through-hole. The conical shape transparent lens has a concave groove(7) on the bottom. The conical shape transparent lens has a convex protrusion on the bottom. A wire incoming hole is punched on the bottom of the conical shape transparent lens.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: OPENING-AND-SHUTTING-TYPE PLANT CULTIVATION CONTAINER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A manufacturing method of a seedling pot of an opening/shutting type is provided to easily promote growth of plants with an opening/shutting device when a seed and a seedling port are planted, and to help transfer of moisture and nutrients to the roots of the plants. CONSTITUTION: A seedling pot of an opening/shutting type includes the following: an opening part(13) used for growing plants(40); an absorbing hole(12) absorbing water; a cover(20) blocking outflow of moisture in a container(10); and an opening/shutting device(11) securing the opening part to help growth of roots(41). A filling material such as soil, bed soil, nutrients, and moisturizer etc is filled in the container.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: DEVICE FOR COVERING HOPPER OF BLENDING BIN

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A device for covering a hopper of a blending bin is provided to prevent environmental contamination and accident by minimizing the flying of raw coal. CONSTITUTION: A device for covering a hopper of a blending bin comprises covers(22) and a link unit. The covers are continuously arranged in the longitudinal direction on the open top of a blending hopper and connected to both ends of a chute(13) of a tripper car(10). The link unit connecting the adjacent covers comprises a guide member installed on the side of the cover, a roller installed inside the guide member, and a link member for connecting the roller to that of the adjacent cover.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: DEVICE FOR FIXING RAW MATERIALS COVERING SHEET

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An apparatus for fixing raw materials covering sheet is provided to more easily fix the covering sheet for covering piled raw materials and to more strongly fix the covering sheet by fixing a rope using the load of piled raw materials. CONSTITUTION: An apparatus for fixing raw materials comprises: a mat(10) which is pressed by piled raw materials; a loop(12) which is installed on the side end of the mat; and a rope(14) which is hung on the loop and fixes the covering sheet. The loop is extended toward the piled raw materials. The loop is installed on the outer and inner side ends of the mat based on a domain of piled raw materials.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: IMAGE APPARATUS AND IMAGE CONTENTS SEARCHING METHOD THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An image apparatus and an image contents searching method thereof are provided to reduce the searching time for a certain image pattern of image contents by extracting and displaying the certain image patterns. CONSTITUTION: A pattern information storage unit(7) stores image pattern information for a keyword, and a control unit(20) compares the stored image pattern information with image contents(102) according to the searching request of a user. The control unit extracts the certain image patterns of the image contents corresponding to the image pattern information. A display unit(5) displays a specific extracted image pattern.

exch:applicant-name.name: KOREA UNIVERSITY RESEARCH AND BUSINESS FOUNDATION

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: MICROPROCESSOR SYSTEM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A microprocessor system is provided to efficiently manage the energy/power consumption performance in a mobile environment and a ubiquitous environment by calculating an optimized DVFS level. CONSTITUTION: A microprocessor system includes an operating system(20) and a microprocessor(10). The operating system calculates a DVFS level, and the microprocessor controls an operating frequency or voltage according to the calculated DVFS level. The DVFS level calculation module(210) calculates the EDP or ED2P of the application program among the preset DVFS levels. The DVFS level calculation module selects the DVFS level of the minimum value.

exch:applicant-name.name: KOREA UNIVERSITY RESEARCH AND BUSINESS FOUNDATION

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PATCH ENGINE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A patch engine is provided to reduce the power consumption of the patch engine by supplying different voltages to first and second storage units. CONSTITUTION: A trace cache(10) includes first and second storage units. The first storage units store instruction traces for high power consumption, and the second storage units store the instruction traces for lower power consumption. When the instruction traces are outputted to a microprocessor, a DVFS(Dynamic Voltage Frequency Scaling) controller(20) controls the supply voltage for the instruction traces of the first and second storage units.

exch:applicant-name.name: KOREA UNIVERSITY RESEARCH AND BUSINESS FOUNDATION

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: OPERATING SYSTEM OF CACHE MEMORY

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An operating system of a cache memory is provided to extend the durability of a sensor node under a sensor network environment by using a cache memory even when the cache memory has a defect caused by a process change. CONSTITUTION: When a cache memory is manufactured, a defect caused by a process change is confirmed. If there is a defect, a defective block or defective cache line is extracted. An address of the defective block or defective cache line is stored and an algorithm is made out. Through the algorithm, a data replacement operation is performed for the rest block except the address.

exch:applicant-name.name: KOREA UNIVERSITY RESEARCH AND BUSINESS FOUNDATION

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: IC CARD FOR PROTECTING POWER MONITORING ATTACK

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An IC card for protecting a power monitoring attack is provided to protect an internal secret key or important information from physical attack by regularly maintaining the power consumption for the all operations of a CPU. CONSTITUTION: A CPU(Central Processing Unit)(120) performs the data operation and generation data operation for a secret key or important information. An interface module(110) performs security recognition and data I/O of a contact or non-contact method. A crypto coprocessor(170) manages the secret key or a password. A DVFS(Dynamic Voltage Frequency Scaling) controller(130) controls the power consumption regularly for the all operations of the CPU.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD, SERVER AND SYSTEM FOR TRANSFORMING COMMODITY IMAGE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method for providing a product image converting function, a shopping mall server and a shopping mall system are provided to reduce image capacity by converting a product image provided in an online shopping mall site, thereby shortening product search time. CONSTITUTION: A product image searcher(210) searchs a product image of a specific product configured by plural frames from a database. A conversion information setting unit(220) sets conversion information including at least one of the number of extracting frames and a conversion format. A product image converter(230) converts a product image to generate a conversion image based on the set conversion information.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: MONITORING SYSTEM AND METHOD USING CCTV NEARBY MOVING OBJECT

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A monitoring system and method using a CCTV nearby a moving object are provided to supply more accurate information on a moving object by obtaining the moving object information from the CCTV adjacent to the moving object. CONSTITUTION: A CCTV(Closed Circuit Television) monitoring system adjacent to a moving object stores CCTV information(S210), and obtains moving object information(S220). The moving object information includes position information and moving direction information. The system acquires moving direction photographing image data through the moving object information and the CCTV information(S230), and transmits the moving object photographing image data(S240).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD AND SERVER FOR PROVIDING INDIVIDUAL COORDINATION SERVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method and a shopping mall server for providing an individual coordination service are provided to select part among users using a personal coordination service to supply a predetermined reward to the selected users, thereby activating the personal coordiantion service. CONSTITUTION: A coordination image generator(210) inputs coordination product images and a figure image of at least one coordination product by user selection. The coordination image generator generates a coordination image. A coordination image posting unit(220) posts the generated coordination image in an online shopping mall site. A best coordination selecting unit(230) selects a best coordination image according to voted preference.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD AND SERVER FOR ESTIMATING PREFERENCE OF COMMODITY

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method and a shopping mall server for evaluating product preference are provided to evalue product preference after collecting product related information in a web site, thereby helping a user buy a product. CONSTITUTION: An information collecting manager(210) inputs a collection request of product related information about a specific product. The information collecting manager collects the product related information from at least one website. An information analysis manager(220) extracts one or more product preference related information. The information analysis manager evaluates product preference about the specific product. An information offering manager(230) offers at least one of the collected product related information and the evaluated product preference.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: INJECTOR FOR CAR

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An injector for a vehicle is provided to minimize an impact noise generated by the operation between a plunger and a solenoid part because diaphragms are installed inside a housing. CONSTITUTION: An injector for a vehicle comprises a housing(100) installed in a fuel supply pipe(P) of an engine, a solenoid part(200) which is installed in the housing and generates a magnetomotive force, a plunger(300) moving up and down according to the operation of the solenoid part, and a needle valve(400) which is installed in the lower part of the housing and has an injection nozzle(420). A first diaphragm(510) and a second diaphragm(520) are installed in the housing in order to absorb an impact noise generated by the operation of the solenoid part. Hydraulic oil is filled between the first diaphragm and the second diaphragm.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SEMICONDUCTOR LIGHT EMITTING DEVICE AND FABRICATION METHOD THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A semiconductor light emitting device and a manufacturing method thereof are provided to improve external quantum efficiency by forming a reflective layer on the outer wall of a light emitting structure. CONSTITUTION: A light emitting structure(135) comprises a second conductive semiconductor layer, an active layer, and a first conductive semiconductor layer. The second conductive semiconductor layer is formed under an electrode layer. The active layer is formed under the second conductive semiconductor layer. The first conductive semiconductor layer is formed under the active layer. A light emitting area protection layer(140) electrically separates the inner part and the outer part of the active layer along the lower circumference of the electrode layer. A reflective layer(180) is formed on the outer side of the light emitting structure.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SEMICONDUCTOR LIGHT EMITTING DEVICE AND FABRICATION METHOD THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A semiconductor light emitting device and a manufacturing method thereof are provided to improve an ESD property by forming a metal layer between a first electrode and an electrode layer in parallel. CONSTITUTION: A light emitting structure(135) is formed on an electrode layer. A first electrode is formed on the light emitting structure. A first insulation layer is formed between the light emitting structure and the outside of the electrode layer. A metal layer(190) is formed on a first insulation layer(180). One end of the metal layer is connected to the first electrode. The other end of the metal layer is opposite to the electrode layer on the first insulation layer.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SEMICONDUCTOR LIGHT EMITTING DEVICE AND FABRICATION METHOD THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A semiconductor light emitting device and a manufacturing method thereof are provided to improve the reliability of a chip by separating a conductive support unit from a light emitting structure using an insulation layer. CONSTITUTION: A conductive layer is formed on the outside of a light emitting structure. An insulation layer(145) is formed on the conductive layer. The electrode layer is formed on the light emitting structure and the conductive layer. A conductive support unit(160) is formed on the electrode layer.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ZOOM LENS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A zoom lens used for a camera module is provided can reduce the length of a lens system while obtaining high a zooming ratio. CONSTITUTION: A zooming part(100) is composed of a plurality of lens groups. An image forming unit(200) arranges a plurality of lenses and reforms an image formed by the zooming part. The imaging unit switches the direction of the light which comes through the reflecting mirror from the zooming part.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: FARM WORK WITH NATURAL HERB MEDICINES AND RED GINSENG SAPONIN

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A farming method using herb medicines and red ginseng saponin is provided to promote cell activity while reinforcing a self-defense function of crops by forming a thin film containing the red ginseng saponin on the crop hull. CONSTITUTION: A farming method using herb medicines and red ginseng saponin includes the following steps: mixing angelicae gigantis Radix, Epimedium koreanum, glycyrrhizae radix, schizandrae Fructus, cinnamomi Cortex, rehmanniae Radix Preparata, cnidii Rhizoma, persimmon vinegar, green tea leaf, corni Fructus, etc with a fixed ratio; adding water to a herb medicine compound; heating the mixture; making extract of the herb medicine compound. The extract is diluted in water, and is sprayed on the crops.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR ACQUIRING ENCRYPTION KEY FOR PROVIDING PREMIUM CHANNEL

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method and an apparatus for acquiring an encryption key in order to provide a premium channel are provided to verify the effectiveness of the encryption key by analyzing a time stamp(TS) value which is extracted from a short term key message(STKM). CONSTITUTION: A mobile terminal(10) buys a premium channel(401). A terminal transmits a minimum TS value and a maximum TS value to a smart card(320). The terminal selects the premium channel(407). The terminal extracts a TS value from the STKM(409). The extracted TS value is transmitted to the smart card(411). The smart card compares the TS value and the effective TS range which is more than or equal to the minimum TS value and less than or the equal to the maximum TS value(413). If the extracted TS value is in the effective TS range, an encryption key in the STKM is effective.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: OPTICAL SHEET AND DISPLAY DEVICE HAVING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An optical sheet and a display device having the same are provided, which satisfy the brightness, contrast, and side visibility of the emitted light. CONSTITUTION: A base layer(1010) comprises a first side and a second side facing the first side. A light concentration layer(1030) is formed in the second side. A light concentration layer comprises a plurality of light concentrating units. Light reflecting units(1070) correspond to valleys and are expanded in the second optical reflection.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPRATUS AND METHOD FOR GAS SCRUBBING

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A gas scrubbing apparatus and a gas scrubbing method are provided to improve gas scrubbing efficiency by directly depositing water on an optimum area for discharging plasma reactive gas. CONSTITUTION: A reactive gas is inputted into a reactive tube(110). A reactor(130) is connected to the reactive tube and changes the inputted reactive gas into plasma gas. A water injection unit(140) injects water into the plasma of the reactor. The water injection unit drops the water at a constant rate.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A SUPPORT BAR FOR THE SUBSTRATE-LOADING CASSETTE AND THE MANUFACTURING METHOD THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A support bar for a substrate loading cassette and a manufacturing method thereof are provided to prevent water or air from entering a hollow body by filling a body with foam. CONSTITUTION: A solid form is processed to have a hollow shape inside the body of a support bar(S110). A CFRP(Carbon Fiber Reinforced Plastic) is stacked on the surface of a processed foam(S125). A forming unit is made by integrating the mold shaped processed foam with the body(S140). If a thermoforming process is completed, the forming unit is separated from the outer mold(S150). The separated forming unit is cut and mechanically processed(S160).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: DEVICE FOR DETECTING HUME OF SMIF POD

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An SMIF(Standard Mechanical Interface) pod with a fume detecting device is provided to increase the lifespan of an SMIF pod by periodically cleaning the inside of the SMIF pod. CONSTITUTION: A pod door(110) is prepared on the lower side of an SMIF pod. A cover(150) is mounted on the upper side of the pod door and covers a wafer cassette in which a plurality of wafers are stacked. The cover includes a detection unit, an analysis unit, and a screen unit. A detector detects fumes remaining inside the SMIF pod. An analysis unit analyzes the chemical element of the fumes detected through the detector. A screen unit numerically displays the element of the analyzed fumes.

exch:applicant-name.name: KOREA ADVANCED INSTITUTE OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: UNIFIED FUEL PROCESSING REACTOR FOR SOLID OXIDE FUEL CELL

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A unified fuel processing reactor for reforming a solid oxide fuel cell is provided to prevent a performance reduction of a fuel cell system by selectively removing low carbon hydrocarbon. CONSTITUTION: A unified fuel processing reactor for reforming a solid oxide fuel cell comprises the following: a primary-reformer(110) forming hydrogen rich reformate gas(B) by reforming a hydrocarbon fuel; a desulfurization unit(120) removing a sulfur compound from the reformate gas; and a post-reformer(130) selectively decomposing a base hydrocarbon compound into hydrogen and methane. The primary-reformer, the desulfurization unit and the post-reformer are mutually separated with an inner dividing wall. The primary-reformer is installed in the center of the reactor, and the desulfurization unit and the post-reformer are located in the concentric structure.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: FUEL CELL AND METHOD OF MANUFACTURING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A fuel cell and a manufacturing method thereof are provided to increase the contacting area between a gas diffusion layer and a current collector for reducing the contact resistance. CONSTITUTION: A manufacturing method of a fuel cell comprises the following: forming a current collector to be partially covered by a gas diffusion layer by vaporizing conductive materials to the gas diffusion layer(S110); and laminating the gas diffusion layer on an electrolyte membrane(S120). The fuel cell comprises the electrolyte membrane, the gas diffusion layer, and the current collector partially buried to the gas diffusion layer. The current collector formation process is performed by a method selected from the group consisting of sputtering, vacuum evaporation and physical vapor deposition.

exch:applicant-name.name: UNIV HONGIK IND ACAD COOP FDN

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PARALLEL TESTING APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR SRAM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A parallel test device and a method thereof are provided to reduce test time by successively testing memory cells within a memory cell group. CONSTITUTION: A plurality of parallel test circuit parts are connected to a plurality of memory cell groups. Each parallel test circuit part simultaneously tests the failure memory cell within the memory cell groups. The parallel test circuit part is connected to each bit line pair of memory cell groups. Each parallel test circuit part comprises a pre-charge circuit(100) pre-charging the bit line pair and a pre-charge test circuit(300) sensing the pull-down malfunction of the memory cells within the memory cell groups. Each parallel test circuit part comprises a pre-discharge circuit(200) pre-discharging the bit line pair and a pre-discharge test circuit(400) detecting the pull-up malfunction of the memory cells within the memory cell group.

exch:applicant-name.name: HYUN DAI HEAVY IND CO LTD

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR MANAGING REPLACEMENT AN ORDER BY SURPLUS STEEL

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A system and a method for managing surplus steel order replacement are provided to effectively manage various order replacement information and surplus steel remaining information. CONSTITUTION: A DB block(110) stores surplus steel information and steel collection information. A surplus steel order replacement management server(101) manages whether to update extracted surplus steel information and surplus collection information. The surplus steel order replacement management server searches surplus steel to extract collection information corresponding to specific surplus steel. The surplus steel order replacement management server integrally controls all operations of an order replacement process of the surplus steel.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ORGANIC LIGHT EMITTING DIODE DISPLAY DEVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An organic light emitting diode display device is provided to implement uniform image quality by minimizing the unevenness of electrical characteristic of TFT and interference of power voltage drop. CONSTITUTION: An organic light emitting diode display device includes a plurality of light emitting cells(1). A light emitting cell comprises a first switch element(T1), a second switch element(T2), a third switch element(T3), a driver component, an organic light-emitting diode device(OLED), and a storage capacitor(Cstg). The first switch element supplies a voltage to the first node through a data line. A second switch element supplies a direct high potential power voltage to a second node. A third switch element supplies high AC potential power voltage to the second node. The driver component is connected between a first node, a second node, and a third node.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ORGANIC LIGHT EMITTING DISPLAY AND MONITORING METHOD OF THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An organic light emitting display and a monitoring method of the same are provided to improve lifespan and image quality of an organic electroluminescent display by performing aging based on the characteristics of a sub-pixel. CONSTITUTION: An organic electroluminescent display device comprises a substrate, a display unit(AA), a monitoring pixel unit(MP), a plurality of monitoring pad parts(MM), and a plurality of aging pad parts(AM). The display unit comprises a plurality of sub pixels. The monitoring pixel unit is commonly connected to an interconnection connected to one sub pixel. A plurality of monitoring pad parts is commonly connected to the interconnection. A plurality of aging pad parts supplies an aging signal to a plurality of sub pixels and the monitoring pixel unit.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ORGANIC LIGHT EMITTING DISPLAY

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An organic electroluminescent display device is provided to improve display quality of a panel by preventing a characteristic deviation between a plurality of sub pixels of a unit pixel. CONSTITUTION: An organic electroluminescent display device includes a substrate and a unit pixel(R,G,B). The unit pixel is positioned on the substrate. The unit pixel is comprised of first to third sub pixels. The first to third sub pixels emit light with different colors. A channel area of a driving transistor included in the second sub pixel is greater than the channel area of the driving transistor included in the first or third sub pixel. The second sub pixel is a green sub pixel. An opening region of the second sub pixel is smaller than the opening area of the first or second sub pixel.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: CLOCK PATH CONTROL CIRCUIT AND SEMICONDUCTOR MEMORY DEVICE USING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An integrated circuit and a semiconductor memory device are provided to reduce current consumption due to the toggling of a clock signal by controlling a clock signal during activation period of a clock control signal. CONSTITUTION: A clock control signal generating part(210) generates a clock control signal which include an activation period corresponding to an enable period of a data input buffer. A clock transferring part(220) provides a clock signal to a write clock pass during the activation period of the clock control signal. The clock control signal generating part delays deactivation time point of the data input buffer enable signal according to the data input buffer enable signal. The clock control signal generating part generates the clock control signal which has an activation period which is extended than the data input buffer enable signal. The clock control signal is deactivated after an input data signal outputted from the data input buffer is aligned.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: INTEGRATED CIRCUIT

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An integrated circuit is provided to synchronize output-initialization signal and output-clock signal in a pre-set time by detecting the cycle of a clock in order to control the delay value of the output-clock signal. CONSTITUTION: A clock cycle detection unit(310) detects the cycle of external-clock signal. A delay modeling unit(320) delays delay-locked-loop(DLL) clock signal. In response to the output signal of the clock cycle detection unit, the delay modeling unit models the delay element of a termination control path which controls a delay value. A first count unit(330) counts the output-clock signal of the delay modeling unit. A second count unit(340) counts the DLL clock signal. In response to the termination signal, a reference signal output unit(350) outputs the reference count value of the first count unit. A comparison unit(360) compares the reference value and the output count value of the second count unit. If the output count value is more than the reference count value, termination enable signal is activated.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: DOOR HANDLE COVER AND MANUFACTURING METHOD THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A door knob cover and a manufacturing method thereof are provided to prevent the damage to a wall due to a door knob cover using a shock absorbing function. CONSTITUTION: A door knob cover comprises body parts(11,12) and an advertisement expression part(13). The body part covers the exterior of a door handle(2). The body part includes the elasticity and the inner surface is closely connected in the exterior of the door handle. The advertisement expression part prepares in the exterior of the body part in order to offer the information about the goods or service. The body part is made of ether rubber, silicon, urethane resin, or synthetic resin.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: NAIL ART TOOL

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A nail art device is provided to mold specific patterns on the surface of silicon or rubber materials and to print various patterns to be projected on the surface of the nail using a transferring method. CONSTITUTION: A nail art device comprises: a combining projection(110) which is included on the upper and lower ends of the device; a grip body(100) which is integrally projected; a bonding groove(210) corresponding to the combining projection; and upper and lower shaping recessed plates(200,300) in which a pattern groove(220) is imprinted on the outer surface of the opposite side of the bonding groove.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: CRAB VACUUM PACKAGING METHOD

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A crab vacuum packing method is provided to supply fresh crab regardless of a distance or time by clearly and rapidly progressing a vacuum and packing process from a capturing process, and to maintain freshness of the crab. CONSTITUTION: A crab vacuum packing method includes the following steps: boiling crab in 100-400°C for 15 ~ 25 minutes(S1); trimming the boiled crab with an air grinder(S3); washing the trimmed crab with water(S4); drying the crab by spraying air with an airless gun to the crab(S5); and vacuum-packing the crab with a vacuum packing material(S6). A crap is transferred and packed between a first and a third steps.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD FOR PURIFICATING CARBON NANOTUBE AND ELECTROMAGNETIC WAVE ABSORPTION MATERIAL TO INCLUDE CARBON NANOTUBE THAT FABRICATED USING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A purification method of a carbon nano tube and the electromagnetic wave absorber including the carbon nano tube are provided to obtain the carbon nano tube with high purity by removing a metallic catalyst or amorphous carbon. CONSTITUTION: A purification method of a carbon nano tube comprises the following steps: preparing the carbon nano tube in a pristine state; processing a dry purification by blowing oxidative gas at 300~550 deg C to the carbon nano tube for 1~2 hours; processing a wet purification by dipping the carbon nano tube to a purification solution at 60~90 deg C, and stirring for 1~2 hours for removing the solution. The oxidative gas is selected from air, oxygen and carbon dioxide. The purification solution is a mixture of more than substance selected from nitric acid, sulfuric acid, hydrochloric acid, and potassium permanganate.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SPEED SENSOR

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A speed sensing apparatus is provided, which can delay water intrusion time and blocks water intrusion path by enhancing watertightness and welding property. CONSTITUTION: An insert(120) is formed in a part of a connector(110) through the injection molding and makes a rib(121) protruded from the outer circumference. A detecting element(130) is installed on the insert and is connected to the connector. A magnet(140) detects magnetic field change of a magnet. The magnet is fixed to the insert and provides magnetic field to the detecting element.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ELECTRODE OF DYE-SENSITIZED SOLAR CELL, MANUFACTURING METHOD THEREOF AND DYE-SENSITIZED SOLAR CELL

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An electrode of a dye-sensitized solar cell, a manufacturing method thereof, and the dye-sensitized solar cell are provided to implement a flexible solar cell by implementing a soft electrode. CONSTITUTION: A metal transparent electrode(20) is formed on one side of a transparent polymer substrate. A hole is formed on the metal transparent electrode. A cathode material layer(30) is formed on the metal transparent electrode. A light-sensitized dye is adsorbed on the cathode material layer.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: LAMP AND ILLUMINAION APPARATUS THEREWITH

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A lamp and a lighting device including the same are provided to prevent a connection tube from being damaged due to external force by arranging a support unit between a main light emitting unit and an auxiliary light emitting unit. CONSTITUTION: A lamp includes an auxiliary light emitting unit(110), a main light emitting unit(120), a connection tube(130), and a connection pin unit(140). A main light emitting unit is interlocked with the auxiliary light emitting unit. The auxiliary light emitting unit is extended fro the main light emitting unit. A connection pin unit is arranged on one side of the auxiliary light emitting unit and includes a pair of connection pins. The pair of the connection pin is arranged cross the arrangement direction of the main light emitting unit and the auxiliary light emitting unit. A connection tube connects the main light emitting unit and the auxiliary light emitting unit.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: LIGHT SOURCE MODULE, METHOD OF MANUFACTURING THE LIGHT SOURCE MODULE AND BACKLIGHT ASSEMBLY HAVING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A light source module, a manufacturing method thereof, and a backlight assembly including the same are provided to simplify a manufacturing process by omitting a process of packaging a light source individually. CONSTITUTION: A light source module includes a light source, a frame plate(110), and an insulation structure. The frame plate has a light source pad unit(121), a power source wiring unit(126), and a peripheral unit(112). The light source is arranged on the light source pad unit. The power wiring unit is formed near the light source pad unit to be electrically connected to the light source and is separated from the peripheral unit and the light source pad unit. An insulation structure is formed on a boundary region of the power wiring unit. The insulation structure insulates the power wiring unit from the frame plate.

exch:applicant-name.name: KOREA ADVANCED INSTITUTE OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: FUEL PROCESSING METHOD FOR SOLID OXIDE FUEL CELL SYSTEM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A fuel processing method for a solid oxide fuel cell system is provided to improve a long time stability of the fuel cell system by removing an unconverted low carbon hydrocarbon compound from reformed gas. CONSTITUTION: A fuel processing method for a solid oxide fuel cell system comprises the following steps: obtaining hydrogen rich reformed gas by using a primary-reformer reforming hydrocarbon fuel, and a desulfurizer eliminating sulfur from the hydrocarbon fuel(S10); and converting a base hydrocarbon compound with C2~C5 included in the hydrogen rich reformed gas into hydrogen and methane by selectively separating the base hydrocarbon compound using a post-reformer(S20).

exch:applicant-name.name: CHEJU NAT UNIV IND ACAD COOP
CHEJU NATIONAL UNIVERSITY INDUSTRY-ACADEMIC COOPERATION FOUNDATION

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SYSTEM FOR SELF-DIAGNOSIS AND AUTOMATION FOR HACCP USING THE USN

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A system for self-diagnosis and automation for HACCP using a USN(Ubiquitous Sensor Network) is provided to grasp a stock situation and supply/shipment situation using an RFID system, thereby saving time and manpower of a manager. CONSTITUTION: If a visitor visits a farm house, a human body detection sensor(11) generates and transmits a human sensing signal. RFID readers input tag numbers of visitor RFID tags and supply/shipment RFID tags. A central management server(100) reads information matched with a transmitted RFID tag number. An HACCP self-diagnosis module(110) records supply/shipment information in a HACCP self-diagnosis table.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: MOTOR FOR DRIVING LENS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A motor for driving lens is provided, which improves resolution of an image by preventing incline of a lens by supporting linear motion of a carrier. CONSTITUTION: A magnet(130) is fixed inside a housing. A carrier(140) is installed at the inside of the housing and is combined with the lens. A coil(150) is fixed to the carrier and transfers the carrier to one side in applying power. Springs(171,175) are the fixed to the carrier and housing and return the carrier transferred to one side.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR CONTROLLING AN ATMOSPHERIC PRESSURE IN A SINGLE CYLINDER ENGINE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An atmospheric pressure learning apparatus and method for a single cylinder engine are provided to minimize a measurement error regarding the actual atmospheric pressure by reducing the measurement period of the atmospheric pressure. CONSTITUTION: An atmospheric pressure learning apparatus for a single cylinder engine comprises a detection unit(400) and a determination unit(500). The detection unit detects the atmospheric pressure based on the pneumatic pressure of a throttle body detected by a pneumatic sensor(100) and the operating state of an intake valve detected by a crank angle sensor(200). The determination unit decides whether to learn the atmospheric pressure detected by the detection unit, based on the engine rpm detected by the crank angle sensor and the opening degree of a throttle valve detected by a throttle position sensor(300).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR CONTROLLING AN IGNITION TIME IN ENGINE OF AUTOMOBILE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An ignition timing control device and method of a vehicle engine are provided to prevent knocking which may occur until the fuel element ratio modeling value is updated after the refilling of fuel. CONSTITUTION: An ignition timing control device of a vehicle engine comprises a fuel level sensor(300) installed in a fuel tank, an operation unit(400) which computes the variation of fuel level based on the fuel level measured by the fuel level sensor and the component ratio of the fuel based on the fuel level variation, a determining unit(500) which determines whether to refill the fuel tank by comparing the fuel level variation with the preset limit, and a controller(600) which advances the ignition timing of the engine based on the component ratio of fuel.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR CONTROLLING A DAMPER CLUTCH

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An apparatus and a method for controlling a damper clutch are provided to control the hydraulic pressure of a damper cultch by using a duty ratio in cutting off fuel in a deceleration region. CONSTITUTION: A controller(320) computes a duty ratio difference based on a first damper control duty ratio and a second damper control duty ratio. The controller detects a hydraulic amendment value corresponding to the duty ratio difference. The controller controls the fluid pressure of the damper clutch based on the hydraulic amendment value. An operation unit(340) produces the difference of the first damper control duty ratio and the second damper control duty ratio by the control of the controller. A storage unit stores a plurality of hydraulic amendment values respectively corresponded to a plurality of duty ratio differences. The storage unit stores the first damper control duty ratio and the second damper control duty ratio by the control of the controller.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR DRIVING THE HIGH PRESSURE FUEL PUMP

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An apparatus and a method for driving a high pressure fuel pump are provided to minimize the loss of torque due to friction by driving the high pressure fuel pump using a motor linked with the piston of the pump. CONSTITUTION: An apparatus for driving a high pressure fuel pump comprises a high pressure fuel pump(100), a motor, a sensor and a controller. The high pressure fuel pump converts the fuel injected through an injection port(140) to high pressure fuel through up-and-down motion of a piston(120) and discharges the high pressure fuel through an outlet(160). The motor is connected to the piston with a link mechanism and drives the piston. The sensor senses the fuel pressure of a fuel supply pipe transferring the fuel discharged from the high pressure fuel pump to the engine. The controller controls the rotation of the motor to the rpm corresponding to the sensed fuel pressure.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: COSMETIC COMPOSITION COMPOSED OF 3 PHASES

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A cosmetic composition comprising three phases is provided to form a formulation of one phase and improve skin moisturization effect. CONSTITUTION: A cosmetic composition comprises an upper layer having vegetable oil, an intermediate layer of silicon oil, and an lower layer of water soluble layer. The vegetable oil is brackcurrant seed oil or hemp seed oil. The vegetable oil is contained ka 5-90 weight% of vegetable oil. The silicon oil of the intermediate layer is dimenthicone oil. The aqueous layer contains 25-90 weight% of polyol. The polyol is glycerin, bytylene glycol, dipropylene glycol, or propylene glycol.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: DISPLAY APPARATUS AND GRAYSCALE DATA COMPENSATING METHOD THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A display apparatus and a grayscale data compensating method thereof are provided to prevent the overload of a system by not allowing the luminance of the image to be delayed by one frame. CONSTITUTION: In a display apparatus and a grayscale data compensating method thereof, a display device corrects the gray scale of an inputted image. A luminance extracting unit(110) divides the inputted image into a pixel unit. The luminance extracting unit extracts gray scale data. A gain calculation unit(120) calculates a gain corresponding to the gray scale data. The gain decision unit(150) decides a final gain for correcting the gray scale.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD FOR MAKING COPPER-SILVER SHELL NANOPOWDERS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A manufacturing method of copper-silver alloy nano powder in a core-shell structure is provided to prevent the oxidation of copper by coating the surface of a copper nano particle with silver, and to improve the conductivity. CONSTITUTION: A manufacturing method of copper-silver alloy nano powder in a core-shell structure comprises the following steps: uniformly arranging copper nano powder with the size of 1~500 nanometers on a filter in an inert gas atmosphere; wetting the surface of the copper nano powder by spraying a solution including a silver ion; coating the surface of the copper nano powder with silver by an oxidation-reduction reaction; and decompressing and washing the filter for collecting the nano powder in the core-shell structure. The solution including the silver ion is selected from the group consisting of AgNO_3, Ag_2SO_4 and other metal salt compound.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: BREAK DOWN APPARATUS FOR A COMPUTER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A breakdown diagnosis apparatus for a computer is provided to facilitate the carrying of all components for detecting the breakdown of a computer by putting all the components inside a portable case. CONSTITUTION: A main board(20) is installed inside a case body, and one end of a power connection cable(30) is connected to the main board. The other end of the power connection cable is connected to a power supply(3a) of a computer body(3) for detecting the breakdown of the computer. A graphic card of the computer body is connected to a graphic card connector(40), and a RAM of the computer is connected to a RAM connector(50).

PURPOSE: A device for preventing the theft of wheels is provided to prevent a tire and wheel of a vehicle from being stolen with a simple manipulation at a low cost. CONSTITUTION: A device for preventing the theft of wheels comprises a wheel shaft(100), a wheel(200), a bolt(300), a locking device. The wheel is combined in the axle. The bolt is inserted into the connecting rod formed in the wheel and the wheel shaft, and fixes wheel on the axle. The locking device will not allow for a bolt to be separated from the wheel and the axle without any authority.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A PRESTRESSING ANCHORAGE SYSTEM OF CARBON FIBER REINFORCED POLYMER PLATE FOR FLEXURAL STRENGTHENING OF RC STRUCTURES

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A prestressing anchorage system of a carbon fiber reinforced polymer plate for flexural strengthening of a concrete structure is provided to effectively repair and reinforce a concrete structure, and to improve bearing capacity. CONSTITUTION: A prestressing anchorage system(200) of a carbon fiber reinforced polymer plate for flexural strengthening of a concrete structure comprises a test object(110), a carbon fiber plate(120), a moving end(130), a fixed end(140), a hydraulic device(150), and a movable end. The test object is composed of a concrete beam or a slab. The carbon fiber plate is attached on the surface of the test object as a reinforcing material. The moving end controls prestressing force, and applies the prestressing force to the carbon fiber plate. The fixed end fixes the end of the carbon fiber plate. The hydraulic device is installed in the moving end to apply the prestressing force to the carbon fiber plate, and is fixed to the movable end. After the prestressing force is applied to the carbon fiber plate, the movable end is coupled to the test object.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: AN HIGH-ADHESIVE SHEET FOR SEMI-CONDUCTOR PACKAGE SINGULATION

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A high adhesive sheet for semiconductor package singulation is provided to prevent a package from being lost or damaged by firmly gripping the package in a cutting process even though the package is small and thick. CONSTITUTION: One side of a base film(1) is processed with a corona. An adhesive layer(2) is coated on the base film processed with the corona. An adhesive compound includes an acryl based polymer, acrylate oligomer, a photo-initiator, a hardener, an adhesive resin, and a leveling agent. The thickness of the adhesive layer is 15 to 35 um.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: CAMERA MODULE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A camera module is provided to maintain an inter-lens gap without an additional facility by performing a coating layer having a certain thickness at the edge thereof. CONSTITUTION: A lens module includes plural lenses(201,203) and a lens barrel. The lens barrel accepts lenses, and a layer(205) having a fixed thickness is formed at the both-sided edge or a surface of one lens among the lenses. The layer is formed by a thick film coating process, and a gap between lenses is formed without an additional facilities.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: FINGERPRINT RECOGNIZING APPARATUS USING CAMERA MODULE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A fingerprint recognizing apparatus using a camera module is provided to reduce the failure in the identification of fingerprints by capturing the entire filter prints at one time through a camera module. CONSTITUTION: A press plate(101) is made of a transparent or opaque material, and a switch(103) is attached to a lower part of the press plate. A switch is activated by pressing the press plate. A light emitting unit(105) is turned on and lights the lower part of the press plate, and a camera module(107) photographs the fingerprint of a user.

exch:applicant-name.name: HYUN DAI HEAVY IND CO LTD

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: POWER TRANSFORMING DEVICE OF WIND TURBINE WITH HYDRAULIC SYSTEM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A power conversion device of a wind turbine using a hydraulic system is provided to reduce the load applied to a pole because a windmill, an accelerator, and a hydraulic pump are installed on the upper side of the pole and a hydraulic motor and a generator are installed on the ground. CONSTITUTION: A power conversion device of a wind turbine using a hydraulic system comprises a windmill(2), an accelerator(3), a hydraulic pump(5), a hydraulic motor(6), an oil tank(7) and a generator(4). The windmill, the accelerator and the hydraulic pump are installed in the upper side of a pole. The accelerator having a low-stage acceleration function transfers the rotation speed of the windmill to the hydraulic pump. The hydraulic pump pumps up oil by being rotated according to the rotation speed of the windmill. The hydraulic motor and the generator are installed on the ground. The hydraulic motor revolves at the speed corresponding to the amount and pressure of the oil pumped by the hydraulic pump. The oil tank stores the oil needed by the hydraulic pump and the oil returning through the hydraulic pump. The generator generates AC voltage by being rotated according to the rpm of the hydraulic motor.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: FILTERING UNIT FOR COMMON PREDICTION BLOCK SYSTEM IN SVC DECODER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A filtering unit for a common prediction block system in an SVC(Scalable Video Coding) decoder is provided to minimize the number of gates by configuring a multiplier through an adder and a shifter. CONSTITUTION: According to a prediction mode, a filter coefficient selector(100) selects a filter coefficient. A data module unit(200) arranges input data, and a first operation unit(300) performs calculation through aligned data and the filter coefficient according to a predetermined prediction block. A filter type decision unit(400) filters a prediction block after determining a filter tap number. An internal storage unit(500) temporally a filtered result, and a second calculation unit(600) performs the calculation for the final result.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD OF FORMING MASK PATTERN

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method for forming a mask pattern is provided to improve the slope of an inclined plane formed on an edge by performing exposure processes using a long wavelength light source and a short wavelength light source. CONSTITUTION: A photoresist is coated on an object. The photoresist is firstly exposed using a first mask(10) and a long wavelength light source. The photoresist is secondly exposed using a second mask and a short wavelength light source. The photoresist is developed after first and second exposure processes. A part exposed by the light is removed on the photoresist in the first and second exposure processes.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: OUTDOOR LAUNDRY DRYING APPARATUS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An outdoor laundry drying apparatus is provided to dry a lot of laundries at a time by deploying a lot of laundry supports in multi stages. CONSTITUTION: An outdoor laundry drying apparatus(1) comprises left and right vertical supports(10,20), a horizontal connection bar(30), a plurality of rotation supports(40a,40b,40c,40d,50a,50b,50c,50d) and a plurality of laundry supports(60a,60b,60c,60d). The vertical supports comprise fixing units(11,21) and brackets, respectively. The horizontal connection bar interlinks the left and right vertical supports. The rotation supports are rotatably connected to each bracket of the vertical supports. The rotation supports are rotated forward by a certain angle to be deployed in multi stages. The laundry supports are horizontally extended to support laundries.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD FOR MANUFACTURING A WHEEL SPEED SENSOR

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method for manufacturing a wheel speed sensor is provided, which prevents damage of a hall element by arranging the hall element between an insert and a permanent magnet. CONSTITUTION: An insert including a terminal is manufactured. A hall element(120) is installed to the insert. A permanent magnet(110) is pressed in the insert and the hall element is fixed to the insert. An insert in which the hall element and permanent magnet are combined is over-molded.

exch:applicant-name.name: HYUN DAI HEAVY IND CO LTD

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: DETECTING DEVICE FOR REACTIVE FORCE PROCESSING OIL-GROOVE INSIDE OF ENGINE CYLINDER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A device for detecting the reactive force of a robot tool machining a cylinder liner is provided to reduce waste of materials and processing time by preventing high pressure and heat caused by the abrasion of the tool. CONSTITUTION: A robot tool machining a cylinder liner comprises a tool(111), a spindle header(110), and a bracket. The tool processes an oil groove on the inner surface of the cylinder liner. The spindle header rotates the tool. The bracket supports the spindle header and is installed on a robot arm. A reaction force detecting apparatus for the robot tool comprises a load cell(130) which is installed on the action site of a reaction force applied to the tool during oil groove processing.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: OPTICAL-ELECTRO WIRING BORAD INTERCONNECTION DEVICE USING ELECTRO-OPTIC HYBRID CONNECTOR

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A photoelectric wiring board connection device using a photoelectric hybrid connector is provided to improve degree of freedom in a design by removing a 45 degree mirror and an optical element from a connection board. CONSTITUTION: A connection board(240) electrically or mechanically connects photoelectric wiring boards(210,220). A connection board includes an electric wiring, an optical fiber, or an optical waveguide. A photoelectric hybrid connector(230) is combined with both sides of the connection board and transmits and receives the electric signal and the optical signal from the photoelectric wiring board and the wiring board. The photoelectric hybrid connector includes a board input unit, a mirror, and a first fixing arrangement unit. One end of the connection board is inserted into one end of the board input unit. The mirror changes the flow of the optical signal. A first stator arrangement unit fixes the connection board.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR MULTI DEBLOCKING FITERING

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An apparatus and a method for multi de-blocking filtering are provided to perform de-blocking filtering operation rapidly by processing a divided boundary through an individual processor by dividing vertical and horizontal boundaries of a macro block. CONSTITUTION: A multi-blocking apparatus(100) includes an input unit(110), a control unit(120), a first processor(130), a second processor(140) and a monitoring unit(150). The input unit receives the data for a macro block for the de-blocking filtering, and a control unit split the vertical boundary of the macro block into n boundaries. The processors perform the de-blocking filtering of the divided vertical boundaries.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: IN-TANK TYPE PUMP

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An in-tank pump is provided to improve the service life of a bearing by adding a needle bearing to the lower part of a shaft. CONSTITUTION: An in-tank pump includes a motor part and a pump part. The pump part includes a ball bearing(510) coupled to the upper part of a shaft, a bottom fixing needle bearing(540) installed on the bottom of the shaft, a plunger(580) converting the circular motion of the bearing into a reciprocating motion, an eccentric cam needle bearing(530) installed adjacent to the plunger on the shaft, a main needle bearing(520) installed between the ball bearing and the cam needle bearing on shaft, and a diaphragm forming a pressure by interlocking with the plunger.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: CAMERA MODULE AND METHOD FOR MANUFACTURING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A camera module and a method for manufacturing the same are provided to produce a camera module in slim shape by removing a glass substrate. CONSTITUTION: A lens unit(40) includes plural lenses, and a holder(30) encloses a barrel. The lens unit is mounted at the barrel, and an optical image is collected through the lens unit. An image sensor converts the optical image into an electric signal, then the electric signal to a circuit board(20) through a via hole(13). A gold plating bump(15) is formed at the lower end part of the via hole.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PRINTED CIRCUIT BOARD MANUFACTURING METHOD

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method for manufacturing a printed circuit board is provided to minimize foreign materials inputted to a PSR(Photo Solder Resist) open region by performing a copper plating to cover a pad of a substrate. CONSTITUTION: A substrate(100) has a circuit region and a dummy region(120). A circuit pattern(113) and a pad are formed on a circuit region. The dummy region is formed around the circuit region. A copper plating(130) is performed on the pad to cover the pad. A protection layer is formed on the pad. PSR ink is coated on the dummy region. The protection layer is removed from the circuit region.

exch:applicant-name.name: HAN IL E HWA CO LTD
HAN IL E HWA CO., LTD.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: DOOR FOR VEHICLE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A door of a vehicle is provided to increase the convenience of passengers by changing the location of armrest according to the physical condition of the passenger. CONSTITUTION: A door of a vehicle comprises a door main trim(14) and a door arm rest(18). The door main trim locates in the bottom of the door center trim. An upper end extension member(15) of the door main trim is integrally combined with the bottom of the door center trim. The door arm rest is installed on the upper end extension member by an arm rest fixing equipment(20). The door arm rest is held up with the device for pivoting an arm rest(30) and is fixed to the front body of the vehicle when the device is removed.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ORGANIC LIGHT EMITTING DIODE DISPLAY AND METHOD FOR MANUFACTURING THE SMAE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An organic light emitting display and a manufacturing method thereof are provided to prevent a display panel assembly from being damaged by separating a sidewall unit of a guide frame from the edge of a display panel assembly. CONSTITUTION: An organic light emitting display device includes a cover window(10), a guide frame(20), an adhesive layer(15), and a display panel assembly(50). The guide frame is combined with the cover window to form a receiving space. The guide frame includes a combination unit and a sidewall unit. The combination unit is combined with the cover window. The sidewall unit is protruded from the combination unit. The adhesive layer is arranged inside the receiving space. The adhesive layer is made of transparent materials. The display panel assembly is combined with the cover window through the adhesive layer.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SOIL RESTORATION APPARATUS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A horizontal multi-stage soil restoration device is provided to improve restoration efficiency in a narrow space while reducing load of the soil restoration device according to driving of an agitating container, and to reduce processing costs without a separated soil transfer unit. CONSTITUTION: A horizontal multi-stage soil restoration device includes the following: an input agitating container(10) crushing and agitating contaminated soil and sprayed surfactants with a plurality of agitating vanes; a middle agitating container(20) discharging the contaminated soil after increasing fluidity of the soil by spraying high pressure air; a discharge agitating container(30) discharging the soil while crushing and agitating the soil and sprayed oxidizing agents; and an adsorption unit removing contaminated sources from the contaminated soil.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR SENSING MEAL ACTIVITY USING PRESSURE SENSOR

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method and an apparatus for sensing meal activity are provided, which can sense accurately a meal behavior by using date sensed by plural pressure sensors. CONSTITUTION: A sensor data collecting part(110) collects data detected by a plurality of pressure sensors installed at a smart dining table mat. A filter(120) filters collected data. A controller(130) analyzes filtered data, measures pressure variation amount through analyzed data, and judges meal behavior through the measured pressure change amount. A data transceiver(140) transmits the meal behavior information according to the meal behavior to the information processing device.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: AUTO STACKER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An auto stacker is provided to improve work convenience and reduce work time by automatically stacking clutch plates. CONSTITUTION: An auto stacker comprises upper and lower conveyors(3,6), a transport unit, a head assembly(12), a head support(24), and a controller(4). The upper conveyor successively transfers clutch plates(2) separating from a scrap one by one. The transport unit loads the clutch plates falling freely from the upper conveyor in a row with a support rod(21), and then transfers the clutch plates to the lower conveyor with cylinders. The head support keeps the location of the head assembly in the separation of the head assembly and a fixed rod(9), and temporarily loads the clutch plates falling freely from the upper conveyor.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS OF PUTTING FERROALLOY

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A hopper apparatus for ferroalloy is provided to enable stable vacuum degassing by preventing the inflow of ferroalloy into molten metal. CONSTITUTION: A hopper apparatus for ferroalloy comprises a storage hopper section(200) in which ferroalloy(F) is loaded, an input hopper section(310) in which the ferroalloy dropped from the storage hopper section is temporarily stored before being put into a vacuum chamber, an insertion blocking section(500) which controls the passage of an inlet pipe(400) connected to the upper and lower sides of the input hopper section, and a control section which controls the operations of the storage hopper section, input hopper section, and insertion blocking section.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: TUNDISH FLUX FEEDER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A tundish flux feeder is provided to improve the quality of molten steel passing through continuous casting by automatically adjusting the kind and amount of flux put into a tundish. CONSTITUTION: A tundish flux feeder comprises a loading part(100) loading one or more kinds of flux, a discharge guide part(800) putting the flux dropped from the loading part into tundish(20), a moving part which is connected between the loading part and the discharge guide part and controls the feed amount of flux through multi-axial rotation of the discharge guide part, and a controller which controls the operations of the loading part, moving part, and discharge guide part.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD FOR MANUFACTURING OF THE ORGANIC USING FECES AS A RAW MATERIAL AND SHELL WASTE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A manufacturing method of a fertilizer using excrements and shells is provided to produce the high quality fertilizer by mixing sawdust, zeolite and the seashells to the excrements for controlling the moisture content of the excrements. CONSTITUTION: A manufacturing method of a fertilizer using excrements and shells comprises the following steps: removing impurities from organic waste including human excretions and livestock excretions; mixing seashell powder as a stabilizing additive into the organic waste; adding zeolite for adsorbing nitrogen components and sawdust for absorbing moisture; fermenting the mixture at 50~60 deg C for 7 days; spraying sodium hypochlorite to the mixture and maturing for 3 days while stirring; and drying the fermented fertilizer using a hot air dryer and packing.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR AN 3D BROADCASTING SERVICE BY USING REGION OF INTEREST DEPTH INFORMATION

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method and an apparatus for an 3D broadcasting service by using a region of interest depth information are provided to induce the interest from a viewer by displaying 3D depth information at a desirable region based on an interest region concept. CONSTITUTION: A content provider obtains a depth information image(512) and 2D image information. An encoder(514) performs masking operation for the depth image information, and encodes a masked depth information image. A decoder(421) decodes the depth information image and the 2D image, and a multi-view generator(522) adds the depth information to the 2D image information.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS AND METHOD OF INDIVIDUAL POWER CALCULATION USING TRANSMITTER IDENTIFICATION SIGNAL

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A device and a method of individual received power calculation using transmitter identification signal are provided to calculate individual received power calculation from transmitters through the whole received power and channel profile signal, thereby accurately measuring received power from transmitters of according to each relay device. CONSTITUTION: An entire received power measuring unit(402) measures the entire received power from all transmitters. A signal is received to the transmitters. An identification signal analyzer(403) extracts a channel profile signal of the transmitters from a signal. The signal is transmitted from specific transmitted through multi paths. A individual receive power calculator(404) calculates an individual received power from the transmitters through the channel profile signal an entire receiving power.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A STABILIZER BAR

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A stabilizer bar for a vehicle is provided to increase the rigidity of a roll by minimizing the deformation loss due to bending by forming in a rectangular cross-section. CONSTITUTION: A stabilizer bar(1) for the vehicles comprises a torsion member(L1), and a link connection member(L2). The torsion member is installed in the car body with a mounting bush. The link connection member bends both ends of the torsion member and the both ends are connected to a suspension system. The boundary of the torsion member and link connection member is rectangle.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: DEVICE FOR CONTROLING THE ROOM OF VEHICLE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An indoor environment control device of a vehicle is provided to automatically discharge cigarette smoke to outside of the vehicle by using a fan, an oxygen sensor and an exhaust fume sensor. CONSTITUTION: An indoor environment control device of a vehicle comprises one or more fan motors(21), a switch, an air duct(23), and an exhaust door. The fan motor emits the cigarette smoke from the interior of automobile part to the car outside. The switch selectively drives the fan motor. The fan motor installs inside the air duct. The air duct installs on top of the indoor car and includes an inlet(23a) and an outlet(23b). The inlet inhales the cigarette smoke from the interior of the vehicle. The outlet discharges the air flowing in through the inlet via the fan motor to the car outside. The exhaust door is opened only when the fan motor operates.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: VARIABLE LOWER ARM UNIT FOR SUSPENSION SYSTEM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A variable lower arm unit for a suspension system is provided to prevent damage to a mounting member by dispersing the load. CONSTITUTION: A variable lower arm unit for a suspension comprises a main arm(11), a slider(13), a connection arm(15), an actuator, a modulating control valve(V), and a pressure sensors(25,27). The main arm is formed with the cylindrical beam and forms the guide slot in one side of the central member. One end of the connection arm hinge -connected through the guide slot to slider. The backend of the actuator is connected to a rearward mounting member(M2) of subframe. The leading end of the actuating rod is integrally connected with the other end of the connection arm. The modulating control valve supplies the actuating pressure of the actuator according to a signal of a controller(23).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SYSTEM FOR DIAGNOSIS A FUEL TANK PRESSURE SENSOR ON VEHICLE AND METHOD THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A diagnostic unit and a method of a pressure tank of a fuel tank for a vehicle is provided to prevent the mis-sensing from the failure decision by inactivating the trouble sensing of the pressure sensor of the fuel tank in the rapid driving and the sudden reduction. CONSTITUTION: A hydraulic sensor for fuel tank hydraulic sensor scanner comprises a pressure detector(10), a fuel detector(20), a vehicle velocity detector(30), an acceleration pedal detection member(40), a controller(50), a warning lamp(60). The pressure detector detects the pressure of the inside of the fuel tank member. The acceleration pedal detection member detects the displacement and operating state of the acceleration pedal. If the controller satisfies the running condition, it inactivates the trouble sensing of the pressure detector. A warning lamp is turned on according to the signal of controller and indicates the malfunction of the pressure detector.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: STRUCTURE OF MOLD FOR PREVENTING CONTRACTION DEAD BOLT AREA OF CYLINDER BLOCK

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A mold structure for preventing the contraction of a cylinder block head bolt part is provided to reduce the weight of the cylinder block by deforming a shape of the mold and rapidly cooling the head bolt part using a chiller. CONSTITUTION: In a mold(10) structure for preventing the contraction of a cylinder block head bolt part, a chiller(20) is inserted into a part in which the head bolt part of the cylinder block is formed. The chiller is supported with a truss core(14) and a water jacket core(12) of the mold. The chiller has a bottle shape in which upper and lower ends are opened. A plurality of holes are included on the surface of the chiller.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD FOR PROCESSING HAND-OVER USED INTER RAT AND MOBILE COMMUNICATION TERMINAL FOR USE THEREIN

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A mobile terminal and a method for processing hand over using inter rat are provided to utilize inter RAT(Radio Access Technologies) neighbor list as neighbor list for femto cell, thereby performing inter-cell reselection and hand over process. CONSTITUTION: A mobile communication terminal receives broadcasting information(S10). The mobile communication terminal confirms inter RAT(Radio Access Technologies) list(S20). If the inter RAT list is defined, the mobile communication terminal inquires inter RAT cell information list(S30,S40). The mobile communication extracts neighbor list information among information items of broadcasting information(S50). The mobile communication terminal performs a hand over processing(S60).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: GEAR TRAIN IN AN AUTOMATIC TRANSMISSION FOR VEHICLES

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A gear train in an automatic transmission for vehicles is provided to implement 6 forward gears and 1 reverse gear by combining a first, second, third planetary gear set with three clutches and three breaks. CONSTITUTION: A gear train includes a first, second, third planetary gear set, a clutch part, and a brake part(B1,B2,B3). The first, second, third planetary gear set forms a complex planetary gear set through mutual combination. The first, second, third planetary gear set changes rotation power inputted from an input shaft. Rotation elements are variably connected with the input shaft and a transmission housing through a friction member. The friction member is comprised of clutch parts(C1,C2,C3) and a brake part.

exch:applicant-name.name: KOREA ELECTRIC POWER DATA NETWORK CO., LTD.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: INSTALLATION RECORD MANAGEMENT SYSTEM AND ITS METHOD FOR DISTRIBUTION AUTOMATION EQUIPMENTS USING GEOGRAPHIC INFORMATION SYSTEM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A system and a method for managing an installation record of a terminal for a GIS connection distribution automation device are obtain installation information of a terminal device for a distribution automation using position information received from a GPS(Global Positioning System) modem. CONSTITUTION: A terminal device(100) for distribution automation obtains coordinate information with a preset cycle through a GPS module(102). A management server(110) manages the installation, dismantlement, and maintenance of the terminal device through a unique number and coordinate information of the terminal device for distribution automation. A GIS server(120) transmits geographic information data corresponding to the coordinate information of the terminal device for the distribution automation to a management server.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: COMBINATION METHOD OF COMBINING PART FOR RIMLESS GLASSES AND THEREOF STRUCTURE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A combination method of combining part for rimless glasses and a structure thereof are provided, which can prevent generation of welding bid in the combining member. CONSTITUTION: Fixture pieces(3,3') are expanded from a nose column(2) or separately manufactured. A fixing unit fixes a combining member(4) on the fixture piece. An assembly unit connects a combining member combined with the fixture piece to the end piece(52) or the bridge.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A COUPLING DEVICE TO SUPPLY PAINTS CIRCULARLY

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A circulating connection apparatus for supplying paints is provided to prevent the paint from being hardened by smoothly circulating the paint even when not spraying the paint temporarily during operation. CONSTITUTION: A circulating connection apparatus for supplying paints comprises a paint circulation unit(2), a paint discharge hose(13), and a head unit(20). A part among the paint which is provided to a paint supply passageway(6) through the paint supply hose(3) is sent to a paint injecting gun after passing the head unit through a paint discharge passage(9). A part is circulated to the paint supply hose through a paint supply pump.
