exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A MULTILAYER PRINTED CIRCUIT BOARD AND A FABRICATING METHOD THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A multilayer printed circuit board and a manufacturing method thereof are provided to improve an interlayer signal connection by alternatively forming a paste bump and a fill-plated bump. CONSTITUTION: A multilayer printed circuit board comprises a first insulation layer(105) and a second insulation layer(117a-117d). First and second insulation layers are alternatively stacked. A paste bump(103) is formed on the first insulation layer. A fill-plated bump(113) is formed on the second insulation layer. A circuit layer is formed on the outermost second insulation layer. The paste bump is an Ag paste bump. The fill-plated bump is made of copper.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ANALOG/DIGITAL TUNER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An analog/digital tuner is provided to meet the requirement standard efficiently by passing an analog signal through a digital SAW filter before passing through an analog SAW filter. CONSTITUTION: A first SAW(Surface Acoustic Wave) filter(200) passes the band of only digital broadcasting frequency signal in an IF(Intermediate Frequency) signal, and a digital demodulator(500) demodulates an amplified digital broadcasting frequency signal into a desirable digital audio/video signal. A second SAW filter passes only analog broadcasting frequency signal band in the digital broadcasting signal, and an analog demodulator(600) demodulates a filtered analog broadcasting frequency signal.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: VISUAL INSPECTION DEVICE FOR CHIP COMPONENT

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A visual inspection device for a chip component is provided to contain recorded image of the chip component by using a digital microscope and a digital video storage part. CONSTITUTION: A visual inspection device for a chip component comprises a mounting plate(110), a digital microscope(120), a digital video storage part(145) and a display unit(150). A chip component(115) is settled in the upper side in the mounting plate. The digital microscope is installed in one side of the mounting plate. The digital microscope gets the image of the chip component. The display unit displays the image of the saved chip component and processing by the digital video storage part.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ORGANIC LIGHT EMITTING DEVICE, AND APPARATUS AND METHOD OF GENERATING MODIFICATION INFORMATION THEREFOR

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An organic light emitting device, an apparatus, and a method of generating modification information thereof are provided to reduce the characteristic deviation of a display device without using an additional compensation circuit at each pixel. CONSTITUTION: A display panel(300) comprises a plurality of pixels. The pixel comprises a driving transistor and an organic light-emitting device. A driving unit(400) supplies a driving signal to a display panel. A signal control unit(600) controls the driving unit. A signal correction unit(900) corrects an input video signal. The signal correcting unit generates a correction image signal. A correction control unit(700) generates correction information. The correction control unit offers the correction information to a signal correcting unit.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A METHOD AND AN APPARATUS FOR DATA TRANSMITTING AND RECEIVING USING AN MOBILE TERMINAL

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method and a device for transmitting data for effectively transmitting image data through an mobile terminal are provided to include identifying information of a receiving mode or transmitting mode in data, thereby preventing malfunction of system. CONSTITUTION: If transmitter selects SMS(Short Message Service) mode, a control unit controls SMS modes switching(S12). If the transmitter inputs text in display screen, a transmitting unit transmits the text to a receiver(S14,S22). If the transmitter selects DMS(Drawing Message Service) transmission, the controller controls DMA mode switching(S16). If the transmitter finishes a image drawing which transmitter wants on touch screen, a data compression unit compresses a image data to specific size of data(S18,S20).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: AUTOMATIC KERATIN FIBER/POLYETHYLENE COMPLEX AND THEREOF SYNTHETIC METHOD

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A keratin fiber/polyethylene resin complex and a manufacturing method thereof are provided to improve mechanical properties including the tensile strength and the flexural strength, and to secure an environment-friendly effect. CONSTITUTION: A manufacturing method of a keratin fiber/polyethylene resin complex comprises the following steps: preparing the length of a keratin-fiber into 0.5~1 millimeters; forming a mixture by compounding 20~40wt% of keratin-fiber and 60~80wt% of polyethylene resin at 130~140 deg C of a mixer for 6~7 minutes; and press molding the mixture at 190~200 deg C for 2~3 minutes.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: IMAGE SENSOR AND METHOD FOR MANUFACTURING THE SENSOR

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An image sensor and a manufacturing method thereof are provided to improve a property of an image sensor by reducing a dark current due to the damage to a boundary between an active region and a field region. CONSTITUTION: A first conductive semiconductor substrate has an active region defined with a field region. A photodiode is formed on the active region. A device isolation layer is adjacent to the photodiode on the field region. A first conductive type first impurity ion region(206) is formed on at least part of the circumference of the device isolation layer. A fist conductive type second impurity ion region(208) is formed on the corner of the device isolation layer on which the first conductive type first impurity ion region is not formed.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SMART BUSINESS MODEL SUPPORTING APPARATUS AND A METHOD THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An intelligent home business model supporting apparatus and a method thereof are provided to supply an intelligent home business model to a user according to the type and technologies of a user, thereby enabling the user to commercialize a corresponding product. CONSTITUTION: An input unit(1) inputs selection information for a unit service model. A database(2) stores an intelligent home business strategy and a profit model. An inferring unit(3) derives a hierarchical system of the unit service model according to an IVM(Industry Value-chain Mechanism). The inferring unit re-combines the intelligent home business strategy with the profit model to generate a unit business model. An output unit(4) outputs the unit business model.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: LIGHT EMITTING DIODE PACKAGE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A light emitting diode package is provided to maximize heat dissipation by inserting a heat pipe filled with a carbon nano tube or metal-carbon nano tube compound into a package mold. CONSTITUTION: A package mold(120) is formed on a lead frame to have a cavity in the center of the lead frame. A plurality of heat pipes filled with thermal conductive fillers are inserted into the package mold. An LED chip(130) is mounted on the lead frame inside the cavity. A molding material(150) is filled in the cavity and protects the LED chip.

exch:applicant-name.name: KOREA UNIVERSITY RESEARCH AND BUSINESS FOUNDATION

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: MINIMIZED ANTENNA APPARATUS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A small antenna apparatus is provided to determine a resonance frequency band using a serial capacitor and a parallel capacitor. CONSTITUTION: A small antenna apparatus comprises a feed unit(120) and a transmission unit(140). The feed unit is formed with a rod shape. The transmission unit is separated from the feed unit. The transmission unit resonates the preset frequency band when receiving the power from the feed unit. The transmission unit includes a serial capacitor(141), a conductor(145), and a parallel inductor(143). The serial capacitor is serially connected to the feed unit. The conductor is extended from the serial capacitor. A parallel inductor is connected to the conductor in parallel.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR PRODUCING QUANTUM DOT HAVING MULTIPLE HEATING AREA

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A quantum dot producing apparatus including plural heating areas, and a method thereof are provided to enhance the producing yield by uniformly producing the particle diameter of quantum dots. CONSTITUTION: A quantum dot producing apparatus including plural heating areas comprises the following: more than one pump(10-1,10-2) inserting plural precursor solutions dissolved with different precursors; a mixer(12) to mix the different plural precursor solutions; and plural heating units(14,16) operating at different temperatures while the mixed precursor solutions are passing through the heating units. The heating unit comprises a first heating unit and a second heating unit.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR PRODUCING QUANTUM DOT

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An apparatus for producing a quantum dot and a method thereof are provided to uniformly mix a solution of the bulk by dividing the solution into micro streams during a mixing process of a precursor solution. CONSTITUTION: An apparatus for producing a quantum dot comprises the following: more than one pump(10-1,10-2) supplying plural precursor solutions to a flow; a micro mixer(12) dividing each precursor solutions into micro pathways on each input port, combining the micro pathways with other micro pathways; a heating unit(16) forming the quantum dot while the mixed solution is passing through by the growth of the nucleus; a mixer heater; and a buffer installed in between the mixer heater and the heating unit.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS AND METHOD FOR SHUTTING DOWN COMPUTER SYSTEM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An apparatus and a method for shutting down a computer system in force is provided to reduce the power consumption of a batter by shutting down a computer system in force when the temperature of a battery continuously rises. CONSTITUTION: A reception unit(100) receives event detection information and a power management signal, and a timer unit(200) measures a passage time from a reception time of event information. If the passage time is over a predetermined time, a decision unit(300) judges a system execution state by comparing the event detection information with the power management signal. If the system execution state is in an abnormal state, a compulsive terminal unit(400) terminates the system in force.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A DISPLAY SYSTEM FOR COURSE AT THE SUBWAY STATION

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A display system for transit path at a subway station is provided, which induces naturally transfer by informing of transfer space or route. CONSTITUTION: A plurality of electric lamps(100) comprise a display unit(200) embodying more than one different color. A plurality of electric lamps are arranged on the ceiling or wall of the subway station at the fixed interval and display the transfer route. A display unit controls the light of the electric lamp and sheds different lights to a plurality of cover materials which are formed in order to have one or more colors.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: CITY LIFE WASTE INTEGRATED MANAGEMENT SYSTEM AND METHOD

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An integrated city life waste management system and a method thereof are provided to spatially grasp regional waste discharge information through a GIS, thereby checking collecting quantity of food waste. CONSTITUTION: A food waste management system comprises the following units. RFID tags are mounted on food waste collecting containers to store intrinsic ID information. RFID readers are installed in cars for collecting food waste. The RFID readers transmit information of the RFID tags. Weight measurement devices measure the weight of the food waste collecting containers. A food waste management server stores and measures the measured weight information.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A SUPPLY FOR VARIABLE STEEL PLATE WHICH IN A MANUFACTURING DEVICE FOR A STEEL

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A feeder for a field prefabricated steel sheet is provided to easily control the input angle of a steel pipe according to the diameter of the steel pipe. CONSTITUTION: A feeder for a field prefabricated steel sheet comprises a fixed frame(100) connected to one side of a steel pipe production line, and a movable frame(200) connected on the top of the fixed frame through a rotating unit(300). The movable frame includes a coil support part capable of supporting any diameter of coil and a coil clamping part which is composed of fixed and movable blocks(211,215) for providing a steel sheet of desired curvature.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A MANUFACTURING DEVICE FOR A STEEL PIPE WITH THE SPOT ASSEMBLING

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A manufacturing device for a field-fabricated steel pipe is provided to enable a work using various diameters of pipe through easy installation and deconstruction. CONSTITUTION: A manufacturing device for a field-fabricated steel pipe comprises a steel sheet feed hopper for continuously providing steel sheets to one side of a steel pipe transfer part(100), a robot(400) which performs welding, cutting and plating of a steel pipe(500) while moving along the steel pipe transfer part, and first and second steel pipe supporting parts which turn the steel pipe made with the steel sheet welded by the robot. The steel sheet feed hopper can support steel sheets for different diameters of coil.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: GLOBAL NAVIGATION SATELLITE APPARATUS AND METHOD USING NEAR FIELD COMMUNICATION

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A global navigation satellite apparatus and a method using near field communication is provided, which can receive a navigation signal from a satellite through the navigation aid information. CONSTITUTION: A near field communication unit(110) receives secondary navigation information from the outside through the local area wireless communication and transfers the received navigation aid information to the other satellite navigation receiving devices through the local area wireless communication. A storage unit(120) stores the received secondary navigation information. A navigation data processor(130) calculates the code delay time about the saved navigation aid information. A satellite navigation receiver(140) receives positioning signal from a satellite by using the secondary navigation information.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR SELLING TOUR MERCHANDISE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method and a system for selling a travel product are provided to enable travelers to select the next travel site through a game, thereby enabling the travelers to experience different and intrinsic travels. CONSTITUTION: A plurality of travelers connects to a wire/wireless network through at least one traveler terminal(110). A travel management server(200) manages a sale site which sells at least one travel product. The travel management server returns a travel expense except travel expense for the selected travel site among travel sites following the entire schedule of the selected travel product.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: REFRIGERATOR

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A refrigerator is provided to make horizontal balance control facilitated by controlling balance according to the condition of a floor. CONSTITUTION: A refrigerator comprises a main body, a door, a controller, a roller, and a leveling unit. The main body offers a space for storing the food at a low temperature. The door selectively opens and closes an opened side of the main body. The controller controls the operation of the main body. The roller is installed in the lower-part of the main body and transfers the main body. The leveling unit controls the horizontal state of the main body using fluid. The leveling unit comprises a fluid receptor(310), a fluid guide(330), and a fluid supplier. The fluid receptor accepts the fluid and is fixed to the lower-part of the main body. The fluid guide guides the movement of the fluid to the fluid receptor.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: COOKING APPARATUS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A cooker is provided to prevent contamination of the steam spray holes by food stuff by closing the steam spray holes when no steam is supplied to the cavity. CONSTITUTION: A cooker comprises a cavity(11), a steam supply pipe(50) and a cap(60). Food is heated in the cavity. The steam supply pipe passes through the bottom of the cavity and is projected into the cavity to provide steam to the cavity. The cap allows steam to be injected to the cavity.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: COOKING APPARATUS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A cooker is provided to prevent the reproduction of bacteria in steam or steam water by keeping the steam or steam water in contact with the antibiotic part. CONSTITUTION: A cooker comprises a cavity(20), a steam water supply part(30), a steam generator(40), and an antibiotic part. Food is cooked in the cavity. The steam water supply part supplies steam water for forming steam sprayed into the cavity. The steam generator generates steam through phase change of the steam water. The antibiotic part is coated on the inner surface of the steam water supply part to keep steam or steam water antibacterial by contacting with the stem or stem water.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: COOKING APPARATUS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A cooker is provided to generate steam and steam water in which mineral is dissolved through contact of the mineral supply part with the steam or steam water. CONSTITUTION: A cooker comprises a cavity(20), a steam water supply part(30), a steam generator(40), and a mineral supply part. Food is cooked in the cavity. The steam water supply part stores steam water for forming steam sprayed to the cavity. The steam generator generates steam through phase change of the steam water. The mineral supply part is formed in the inner surface of the steam water supply part, which contacts with the steam water, so that mineral is dissolved in the steam or the steam water.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: EXTRACTING DEVICE OF POWDER MATERIAL CONVEYING APPARATUS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An extracting device installed at a powder conveying apparatus is provided to remove the constraint on installation and operation spaces for by eliminating the need to comprise the outer space for the opening/closing of a valve. CONSTITUTION: An extracting device(100) installed at a powder conveying apparatus comprises a powder receiving container(110) and a discharging unit. The powder receiving container comprises a lead-in passage(111), a lead-out passage(112) and first and second hanging sills(113, 114). The lead-in and lead-out passages are connected to a powder transport passage. The first and second hanging sills are projected along the inner circumference of the lower wall of the inner side. The discharging unit comprises a rotating disc(121), a rotation shaft(122) and a driving unit(123b). The rotation disc has the smaller diameter than the inner circumference of the powder receiving container. The rotation shaft passes through the thick part of the rotation disc and is integrally connected to the rotation disc. The driving unit enables the rotation disc and the rotation shaft to perform the rotation operation.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: DEVELOPER TRANSFERRING APPARATUS USABLE WITH A DEVELOPING UNIT AND DEVELOPING UNIT USABLE WITH AN IMAGE FORMING APPARATUS HAVING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A developer transferring apparatus usable with a developing unit and a developing unit usable with an image forming apparatus having the same are provided to extend the durability of a developer of an image forming device by improving the hardness of a developer conveyor belt. CONSTITUTION: A developer conveyor belt(131) conveys a developer, and driving shafts(132,133) are installed near the developer conveyor belt. The driving shafts rotate the developer conveyor belt in an infinite track, and a driving protrusion is formed at the developer conveyor belt. The driving hole is formed at the developer conveyor belt, and has a reinforcing structure at a rear side portion in the rotation direction of the developer conveyor belt.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: VOLTAGE EQUALIZATION CIRCUIT OF ELECTRIC ENERGY STORAGE DEVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A voltage equalization circuit of an electric energy storage device is provided to rapidly equalize a voltage between electric energy storage cells by transmitting electric energy between electric energy storage cells. CONSTITUTION: An electric energy storage cell serial string(110) is formed by serially connecting a plurality of electric energy storage cells. At least one voltage equalization cell string(120) includes at least one voltage equalization cell. A plurality of first switching units connects an electric energy storage cell and a voltage equalization cell. At least one second switching unit connects an electric energy storage cell serial string and a voltage equalization cell string in parallel. A controller(130) controls the first and second switching unit.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS AND METHOD TO SHUT HARMFUL SITES

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An apparatus and a method to shut harmful sites are provided to shut off a harmful site through a private proxy and an Internet standard proxy. CONSTITUTION: A harmful site blocking apparatus(10) includes a packet collecting unit(110), a packet analysis unit(130) and a packet control unit(120). A packet is transmitted and received to and from the harmful site blocking apparatus. The packet analysis unit extracts a header field of an HTTP(Hypertext Transfer Protocol) request packet as well as a URL(Uniform Resource Locator) of a URI(Uniform Resource Identifier).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS AND METHOD TO SHUT HARMFUL SITES

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An apparatus and a method for blocking harmful sites are provided to block a harmful site using a hash value of a URL(Uniform Resource Locator), thereby increasing processing capacity while increasing processing speed. CONSTITUTION: An operation unit(120) generates a URL hash value from URL information. If the generate hash value is matched with at least one of lists of the preset hash values, a blocking unit(140) blocks a site corresponding to the URL. A storage unit(130) stores a list of the hash value. A collecting unit(110) collects transceived packets. The collecting unit divides an HTTP(Hypertext Transfer Protocol) request packet from the collected packets.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A DOOR FOR REFRIGERATOR AND MANUFACTURING METHOD OF THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A refrigerator door improving the diffused reflection by the surface bend and a method of manufacture thereof are provided to prevent foaming heat being delivered to an outer case using a foaming heat shielding member. CONSTITUTION: A refrigerator door comprises an inner case(300), an outer case(200), a foaming insulating member, a foaming heat blocking member. The inner case forms the rear side. The outer case is connected to the inner case and forms a specific space. The foaming insulating member is filled in a space formed between the inner case and outer case. The foaming insulating member is located in the outer case and prevents the foaming heat from being delivered to outer case. The foaming heat blocking member is one of a ceramic insulator, a vacuous insulator, and aerogel. The foaming heat blocking member is installed in the rear side of the outer case.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A FLAME-TRACING SYSTEM FOR OUTDOOR AREA USING WIRLESS SENSOR NETWORK

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A flame-tracing system for outdoor area using wireless sensor network is provided, which can sense progressive direction of flame besides the fire generation perception. CONSTITUTION: A radio frequency sensor module(100) for flame monitoring senses the wavelength of the flame occurring in the installed place and transmits the monitoring result in a fire occurrence signal. A master communications unit(200) transmits the identification data and the fire occurrence signal to a control system(300). A control system outputs the identification data and fire occurrence signal of the radio frequency sensor module on a screen and performs outdoor fire detection monitoring.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: BIOMETRICS APPARATUS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A biometrics apparatus is provided to irradiate a linear ray onto a finger in order to extract a clear blood vessel pattern of a finger. CONSTITUTION: A finger reception space receives a finger(10) through a non-contact method. A light radiating unit(20) radiates a linear ray onto the finger and includes a light source(21) and a line generating lens(23). A camera captures an image of the finger, and a control unit(40) processes the captured image. In addition, the control unit extracts a blood vessel pattern of the finger through the image processing operation.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: COMPOSITION FOR ANTI-OXIDATIVE AND ANTI-INFLAMMATORY ACTIVITY COMPRISING THE EXTRACT AND FRACTION OF PHLOMIS RADIX

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A cosmetic composition containing Phlomis Radix extract is provided to ensure anti-oxidation effect and to improve and maintain health skin. CONSTITUTION: A cosmetic composition having anti-oxidation and anti-inflammation effects contains 0.001-20 weight% of Phlomis Radix extract. The Phlomis Radix extract is obtained by extracting with purified water, alcohol, or mixture thereof. A method for manufacturing the Phlomis Radix extract comprises a step of washing dried Phlomis Radix and immersing Phlomis Radix in 1-30 times of purified water to extract at 30-150°C for 0.5-10 hours. The cosmetic composition is used in the form of cream, lotion, skin, essence, pack, soap, cleansing foam, emulsion, gel, or cosmetic liquid.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: INK COMPOSITION FOR MEMBER IN REFRIGERATOR AND PRINTING METHOD OF THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An ink composition for a printed member in a refrigerator and printing method using thereof are provided to reduce the corrosion of a printed surface of the printed member by using ethylene glycol monobutyl ether as a diluent. CONSTITUTION: An ink composition for a printed member in a refrigerator contains a chlorine and acryl group based mixed resin, an organic solvent, a dye dissolved by methyl ethyl ketone, and ethylene glycol monobutyl ether as a diluent. A printing method using the ink composition comprises the following steps: forming the ink composition by dissolving the mixed resin into a mixture including the ethylene glycol monobutyl ether and the organic solvent and adding the dye; printing the ink composition to the printed member using a silk screen method; drying the ink composition; and coating the ink composition without the dye on top of the printed member.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ANALYSIS METHOD OF THRESHOLD VOLTAGE DISTRIBUTION OF NON-VOLATILE MEMORY

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An analysis method of a threshold voltage distribution of a nonvolatile memory is provided to control a nonvolatile memory device by estimating an original form of threshold voltage distributions according to the overlapping degree. CONSTITUTION: An analysis method of a threshold distribution of a nonvolatile memory includes a step of detecting the overlapping degree by accessing a plurality of memory cells which has an overlapped threshold voltage distribution. A distribution analysis method of a nonvolatile memory device comprises a step of estimating an original form of each overlapped threshold voltage distribution according to the overlapping degree. In the detection step, the overlapping degree copes with the number of memory cells in a threshold voltage which has minimum distribution density in the overlapped threshold voltage section. The overlapping degree is determined by referring to a rate between one maximum value and the minimum value among the threshold voltage distributions.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: RESISTANCE VARIABLE MEMORY DEVICE PROTECTING COUPLING NOISE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A variable resistance memory device is provided to prevent a current flowing from a bias circuit to a pre-charge circuit by setting a voltage level of a pre-charge signal lower than the addition between a power voltage and a threshold voltage. CONSTITUTION: A memory cell is connected to a bit line. A pre-charge circuit(243) pre-charges the bit line in response to a pre-charge signal. A bias circuit(244) offers a bias voltage in response to the bias signal to the bit line. A control logic controls the pre-charge signal and the bias signal. The control logic offers the bias signal during the pre-charge period to the bias circuit. The bias voltage is applied to the bit line in order to read out the memory cell.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: IMAGE FORMING APPARATUS, IMAGE FORMING SYSTEM AND PRINTING METHOD THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An image forming apparatus, an image forming system and a printing method thereof are provided to reduce a printing time and an image processing time while maintaining the quality of a color screen. CONSTITUTION: An image forming apparatus obtains image data(S10), and performs a multi-bit half toning for a pixel when a printing operation is scheduled by a high-density developer(S30). The image forming device performs a single-bit half toning if the pixel is not scheduled to be printed by the high-density developer. The image forming device prints the half-toned image data(S50).

exch:applicant-name.name: KOREA RESEARCH INSTITUTE OF BIOSCIENCE AND BIOTECHNOLOGY

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: THE NEW INTERMEDIATE OF MORACIN P AND O COMPOUNDS, THE PREPARATION THEREOF AND THE PREPARATION OF MORACIN P AND MORACIN O COMPOUNDS USING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An intermediate, a manufacturing method thereof, and a manufacturing method of moracin P and moracin O compounds using thereof are provided to produce the compounds with high yield with a stable reaction condition. CONSTITUTION: An intermediate is marked as chemical formula V. A manufacturing method of the intermediate comprises the following steps: forming a compound marked as chemical formula III by iodide reacting 2,4-dihydroxybenzaldehyde; forming a compound marked as chemical formula IV protected with di-Boc by reacting the compound marked as the chemical formula III with Boc_2O; and forming the intermediate marked as the chemical formula V by obtaining a benzyl alcohol intermediate by reacting the compound marked as the chemical formula IV with a hydride derivative of aluminum or a hydride derivative of boron, and reacting the benzyl alcohol intermediate with a 2-methylpropenyl metal compound.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: GEOGRAPHICAL DISPLACEMENT SENSING UNIT

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A geographical displacement sensing unit is provided to measure 3D coordinate displacement on a real time basis. CONSTITUTION: A geographical displacement sensing unit comprises sensing units(112,114), a timing setting unit(210) and a displacement calculating unit(220). The sensing unit measures 3D coordinate displacement in the Tilt valve at the longitudinal direction in movement at the measurement timing. The timing setting unit establishes the measurement timing. The displacement calculating unit computes 3D coordinate displacement data measured in the sensing unit to the ground displacement amount.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPRATUS AND METHOD FOR DEPOSITING THIN FILM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An apparatus and a method for depositing a thin film are provided to form a strontium ruthenium oxide layer with a stable perovskite structure by supplying two kinds of source gases to the substrate. CONSTITUTION: A substrate receiver(118) is installed inside a reactive space and receives a substrate. A gas injection device(114) includes a gas supply tube(120), a mixed source gas sprayer, a purge gas sprayer, and a reactive gas sprayer. The gas supply tube includes a plurality of supply tubes for supplying a source gas, a reactive gas, and a purge gas. The mixed source gas sprayer, the purge gas sprayer, and the reactive gas sprayer are opposite to the substrate receiver and are connected to the gas supply tube.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPRATUS FOR TREATMENTING SUBSTRATE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A substrate processing device is provided to distribute accumulated heat by installing a light diffusion lens on a position corresponding to the center of a substrate receiver which has accumulated heat. CONSTITUTION: A chamber(112) provides a reactive space. A substrate receiver(120) is positioned on the reactive space and receives a substrate. A heating unit includes a lamp, a reflective plate, and an optical lens. The lamp is positioned on the lower side of the chamber and heats the substrate receiver. The reflective plate reflects the light from the lamp. An optical lens is positioned on the lamp.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPRATUS FOR TREATMENTING SUBSTRATE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A substrate processing apparatus is provided to uniformly heat a substrate receiver by compensating for the heat loss of the peripheral region of the substrate receiver. CONSTITUTION: A chamber includes upper and lower sides made of transparent materials and provides a reactive space. The substrate receiver is positioned on a reactive space and receives the substrate. A heating unit is positioned on the lower side of the chamber and heats the substrate receiver. An edge ring(130) is installed on the inner side of the chamber. A light transmission space(180) is installed between the edge ring and the substrate receiver and transmits light from the heating unit. An upper reflective plate(182) is installed on the upper side of the chamber corresponding to the light transmission space.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPRATUS FOR TREATMENTING SUBSTRATE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A substrate processing apparatus is provided to stably receive or separate a substrate by installing a guide surface for guiding a lift pin to the surface of the lift pin support stand. CONSTITUTION: A chamber offers a reactive space. A substrate receiver is positioned on the reactive space, ascends and descends, and receives a substrate. A penetration hole(158) is installed on the substrate receiver. A lift pin(156) is positioned inside the penetration hole. A lift pin support stand(166) is positioned on the lower side of the chamber to support the lift pin and is integrated with the lower side of the chamber.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: HYDRAULIC OIL COMPOSITION HAVING LONGER DRAIN INTERVAL FOR CONSTRUCTION EQUIPMENT

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A hydraulic fluid composition for a longer drain interval for construction equipment is provided to prolong a use life span over 5,000 hours by strengthening oxidation stability and controlling thermal oxidation of lubricating oil. CONSTITUTION: A hydraulic fluid composition for a longer drain interval for construction equipment contains 3.0 weight% ~ 10.0 weight% of detergent/dispersant package including a detergent/dispersant agent, antioxidant, and diluents based on total weight of the hydraulic oil composition. The detergent/dispersant package includes zinc alkyl dithiophosphate, polyolefin amide alkyleneamine borate, and magnesium long chain alkaryl sulphonate.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS FOR DIGITAL MULTIMEDIA BROADCASTING AND METHOD OF CONTROLLING THE THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An apparatus for digital multimedia broadcasting and a method of controlling the same are provided to prevent the insertion loss caused by an FM band restriction filter by driving an FM band restriction filter. CONSTITUTION: An FM(Frequency Modulation) band restriction filter(150) removes an FM signal, and a control unit(110) receives current position information from a position information processor(200). The control unit compares the current position information with the position information of a memory unit(220). In the region corresponding to the position information, the FM signal is over a reference value. In order to switching the connection state of the FM band restriction filter, the control unit controls a switch unit(230).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A DUAL FACE PACKAGE AND A FABRICATING METHOD FOR THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A double sided electrode package and a manufacturing method thereof are provided to prevent a resin compound material from being hardened by manufacturing an upper substrate using a molding process or supporter. CONSTITUTION: A penetration electrode(146a) is connected to a die pad. A lower rewiring layer(148) is connected to the penetration electrode. An insulation layer includes a penetration electrode connected to a post electrode(134). The insulation layer includes the upper rewiring layer connected to the post electrode on one side. An adhesive layer is formed on one side of the semiconductor substrate and attaches the insulation layer to the semiconductor substrate when the penetration electrode is connected to the post electrode.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: AUGER SCREW

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An auger screw is provided to stably form an excavating hole by reinforcing the bearing power of a pipe shaped pile embedded in the ground. CONSTITUTION: An auger screw comprises a screw shaft(11), screw wings(12), a bit(13), lateral bits(16), bases(15), and a pressure line(17). The screw wings are protruded from the screw shaft. The bit is protruded from the bottom end of the screw shaft, and excavates earth and sand. The lateral bits are arranged on the outer surface of the screw shaft, and are drawn in/out. The bases apply pressure to the lateral bits to be drawn in/out. The pressure line controls the internal pressure of the bases.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A REFRIGERATOR

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A refrigerator is provided to prevent the slipping of food which puts on the inner side of the home bar door by securely attaching a food slipping preventive member to the home bar door. CONSTITUTION: A refrigerator(1) comprises a main body(100), a door(120), a home bar frame(220), and a home bar door(250). The main body comprises a storage safekeeping the food at a low temperature. The door is formed on the main body to rotate and selectively seals the storage. The home bar frame is mounted on the front side of the door and has an opening. The home bar door is connected to the home bar frame to rotate. The home bar door includes a home bar door cover, a base, and a non-slip member. A part of the non-slip member exposes through a hole which is formed on the base.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: IMAGE DISTORTION COMPENSATION METHOD AND APPARATUS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An image distortion compensation method and an apparatus thereof are provided to correct the distortion of an image through a homographic model. CONSTITUTION: A motion estimation unit calculates a homographic value through the comparison of an input image with a previous image(220). In addition, the motion estimation unit calculates variation information based on a distortion value and the homographic value(225). An image processing controller corrects the distortion of a current image through accumulated variation information(240). If the number of the stored images is a predetermined number, the image processing controller generates one panorama image through the images.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A REFRIGERATOR

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A refrigerator is provided to prevent a basket from being detached from the refrigerator while a user is using the basket. CONSTITUTION: A refrigerator(1) comprises a main body(10), a door(15), and a basket(20). A refrigerator comprises a main body comprises a storage in which the food is kept at a low temperature. The main body comprises a storage in which the food is kept at a low temperature. The doors are mounted on the main body to rotate and selectively open and close the storage. The rear end part of the basket is positioned closely to the rear side of the door and downward moves. A hooking part is formed in the door. The basket is settled on the hooking part. A bent groove is formed on the side of basket. The hooking part is inserted into the bent groove and move up and down.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A REFRIGERATOR

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A refrigerator preventing the leakage of cool air is provided conveniently to open a door by improving the structure of a door basket. CONSTITUTION: A refrigerator comprises a main body(10), doors(14,15), and a basket(20). The main body comprises a storage in which the food is kept at a low temperature. The doors are mounted on the main body to rotate and selectively open and close the storage. The basket is located along the edge of the door and seals the gap between the door and the main body. The basket comprises a basket body, a fixing unit, and a magnetic body. The fixing unit is inserted into the door with being expanded to the back side of the basket body. The magnetic body is located at the front end of the basket body and adheres closely to the main body.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: COMPOSITE ELECTRO-OPTICAL CONNECTOR MODULE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A composite electro-optical connector module is provided, which can maximize usage range by transferring an optical signal, an electric signal, and power at the same time. CONSTITUTION: A plurality of sockets(110) comprise a through-hole in the longitudinal direction. A first main body(120) forms a plurality of through-holes in the longitudinal direction in order to insert a socket. An insulating body(130) is established in order to come in contact with the front end of the first main body and forms a plurality of through-holes in the longitudinal direction in order to insert a tube. A clip(140) comprises a through-hole in the longitudinal direction in order to insert the first main body and insulating body and forms a projection a screw.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: HYBRID OPTICAL FIBER ADAPTOR

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A hybrid optical fiber adaptor is provided, which can prevent loss of a transmission signal by synchronizing the modes of heterogenous optical fibers. CONSTITUTION: A socket(110) extends a plug to both sides of the body(120) and receives optical fibers in the longitudinal direction. A body comprises a penetration hole for installing a socket thereinside. A pair of tubes(130) are inserted into the external diameter of the plug. A pair of clips(140) are fixed in order to come in contact with both ends of the inside body. A pair of covers(150) are coupled with each other by coming in contact with each other and form an internal insertion part for the insertion of the body.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SHOE TO CONTROL HEIGHT

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: Footwear which height is controlled is provided to enable a wearer to easily control the height of the footwear and to prevent the injury of the user foot due to the slide of a height control unit. CONSTITUTION: Footwear which height is controlled comprises: a footwear body; a heel which is fixed to the footwear body; and a height control member which controls the height of the footwear by fixing/releasing the upper part and the lower part(40) of the heel. The height control member includes: a fixing groove(21) which is included on the upper part of the heel; a screw(43) which is included in the lower part of the heel; a fixing member(30) in which a screw groove is formed on the lower part of the fixing member; and a plurality of separating ends which are formed by cutting the upper part of the fixing member.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ROBOTIC DRILLING SYSTEM AND THE METHOD

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A robot drilling system and method are provided to improve drilling quality by carrying out drilling after correcting a positioning tolerance and squareness. CONSTITUTION: A robot drilling system comprises an information collecting and extracting unit(220), an information processing unit(240), and a vision system unit(260). The information collecting and extracting unit collects three-dimensional information about a work position and extracts location information and vector information. The information processing unit programs the operation of a robot according to the information delivered from the information collecting and extracting unit. The vision system unit compares the programmed work position with the actual location of the robot and corrects a positioning tolerance of the robot.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SCRIBING APPARATUS AND METHOD OF SCRIBING SUBSTRATE USING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A cutting device and a method for cutting a substrate using the same are provided to prevent a scribing failure by performing a scribing process with proper pressure. CONSTITUTION: A scribing unit forms a scribe line on an object by etching the object with a preset depth. A pressurizing unit pressurizes a scribing unit to the object. A pressure measurement unit(340) outputs an pressure value outputted from a scribing unit by measuring the pressure applied from a scribing unit to the object, and measures the position in which the scribing unit is contacted with the object. A controller(370) receives the pressure valve from the pressure measuring unit and controls the input pressure value applied to the pressurizing unit based on the output pressure value received from the controller.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PERSONAL TRAVEL DIGITAL ASSISTANTS BUSINESS MODEL

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A personal travel digital assistant business model is provided to supply information of a terminal to which a mileage and an electronic coupon combined with specialized contents are inserted, thereby maximizing profits. CONSTITUTION: Electronic coupons are classified by a condition according to each sightseeing item. Travel contents and sightseeing item data are mixed and combined. The mixed data is processed. The processed data is combined with map information of the information terminals. The combined data and map information are updated.

exch:applicant-name.name: UNIV KYUNG HEE UNIV IND COOP
UNIVERSITY-INDUSTRY COOPERATION GROUP OF KYUNG HEE UNIVERSITY

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: THE PERSONAL FINANCIAL INDEX-BASED AGENT SERVICE SYSTEM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A personal financial index-based agent service system is provided to develop a personal financial index according to a personal situation through an index agent, thereby providing a service suitable for the personal situation. CONSTITUTION: A smart apparatus(10) inputs personal preference. An account database(40) stores information related to the financial situation of a user. A context DB(50) stores contextual information which the user inputs. A personal ontology server(20) stores real time personal contextual information. A context-aware user agent(60) senses a situation of the user in real time and changes information of the personal ontology server.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SYSTEM OF MEASUREMENT FOR EMOTIONAL ENGINEERING FOR IMAGE DIAGNOSIS VALUATION ABOUT MATTERS AND A MAN AND DIAGNOSIS VALUATION OF BRAND, BRAND CONCEPT, DESIGN AND NAMING OF DIAGNOSIS VALUATION INTO INTERNET, AND METHOD THEREOF, AND MEDIA THAT CAN RECORD COMPUTER PROGRAM SOURCES FOR METHOD THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A system of measuring emotional engineering for image diagnosis valuation about matters and a man and diagnosis valuation of brand, brand concept, design and naming through an internet, and a survey method thereof, and a recording medium storing a computer program for the method are provided to quantitatively measure and analyze complex emotions of a human using a psychological test survey. CONSTITUTION: An image term corresponding to an emotional engineering measurement target is selected. A survey answer and a response time are stored(S70). If the survey is finished, the web server diagnoses and evaluates an emotion of a consumer for the emotional engineering measurement target in real time.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: CAN HAVING A CAP

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A cans having a cap is provided to enable old people and children to easily open the can by enabling the people to hold using one hand and turning the can using the other hand and to keep remaining content by turning the cap and sealing the can again. CONSTITUTION: A can(100) having a cap comprises a blocked cylindrical main body(110) and a cap(120) which covers the upper part of the main body and rotates. The main body comprises: a cylindrical container(111) having sealed lower part and an opened upper part; an upper plate(113) covering the upper part of the container; and a cut part(119) which is separated from an upper side(115) of the upper plate. An upper plate(122) of the cap is connected on the upper plate of the main body using a rivet(130).

exch:applicant-name.name: KYUNGPOOK NATIONAL UNIVERSITY INDUSTRY-ACADEMIC COOPERATION FOUNDATION

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: THE SINGLE-WALLED CARBON NANOTUBE/CELLULOSE COMPOSITES AND THEIR MANUFACTURING METHOD

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A single-walled carbon nano tube/cellulose composite is provided to improve the electric, mechanical, and thermal properties of cellulose by uniformly dispersing a single-walled carbon nano tube to the cellulose. CONSTITUTION: A single-walled carbon nano tube/cellulose composite contains a single-walled carbon nano tube and cellulose. The single-walled carbon nano tube is included in the composite for 0.01~70.0wt%. A manufacturing method of the single-walled carbon nano tube/cellulose composite comprises the following steps: preparing the single-walled carbon nano tube; obtaining a mixed solution containing N-methylmorpholine-N- oxide(NMMO) solution and the single-walled carbon nano tube; sonicating the mixed solution; and mixing the cellulose to the mixed solution.

exch:applicant-name.name: KYUNGPOOK NATIONAL UNIVERSITY INDUSTRY-ACADEMIC COOPERATION FOUNDATION

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: THE MULTI-WALLED CARBON NANOTUBE/CELLULOSE COMPOSITES AND THEIR MANUFACTURING METHOD

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A multi-walled carbon nano tube/cellulose composite and a manufacturing method thereof are provided to uniformly disperse and combine a multi-walled carbon nano tube with cellulose for improving conductivity, tensile strength and others. CONSTITUTION: A multi-walled carbon nano tube/cellulose composite contains 0.01~70wt% of multi-walled carbon nano tube and cellulose. A manufacturing method of the multi-walled carbon nano tube/cellulose composite comprises the following steps: preparing the multi-walled carbon nano tube; obtaining a mixed solution containing N-methylmorpholine-N-oxide solution and the multi-walled carbon nano tube; sonicating the mixed solution; and mixing the cellulose with the mixed solution.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: LIGHT EMITTING DIODE PACKAGE AND METHOD FOR MANUFACTURING THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A light emitting package and a manufacturing method thereof are provided to reduce the size of a package by forming a zener diode on a substrate. CONSTITUTION: A substrate with the first polarity includes a groove corresponding to upper and lower surfaces. First and second insulation layers have openings which exposes a part of the upper and lower surfaces of the substrate on both sides of the groove. First to fourth diffusion layers are formed on the upper and lower surfaces of the substrate exposed through the openings. First to fourth electrodes are connected to first to fourth diffusion layers and are formed on the upper sides of the first and second insulation layers. A first light emitting diode(201) is flip-chip bonded with the first and second electrodes. A second light emitting diode(202) is flip-chip bonded with the third and fourth electrodes.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: FLOWERPOT

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A manufacturing method of a flowerpot is provided to improve nutrition supply efficiency while easily fixing plants in the flowerpot by putting a planting member which is swollen with moisture absorption in the flowerpot. CONSTITUTION: A flowerpot includes a flowerpot container(10) and a planting member(20). The planting member is a mixture of a crushed vegetation material and an adhesive material. The planting member is compressed and molded with a shape which is easily put into the flowerpot container. A planting groove(21) is formed on the top of the planting member. The planting member is coir fiber. A protrusion is formed to prevent separation of the platning member. A drain pipe passes through the planting groove in the planting member.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS FOR ABSORBING AN IMPACT ON THE BUMPER OF A VEHICLE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An apparatus for absorbing an impact applied to a bumper of a vehicle is provided to reduce the length of a back beam by directly connecting inner and outer rails to stays without a separate connector. CONSTITUTION: An apparatus for absorbing an impact applied to a bumper of a vehicle comprises an outer rail(110), an inner rail(120), and stays(130a,130b). The outer rail is extended in the traverse direction. The inner rail is arranged in parallel behind the outer rail, with the central portion integrally connected to the outer rail and both ends separate from the outer rail. The stays are installed between both ends of the inner rail and distribute an impact load by connecting the rails to a vehicle body(115) so that only a reduced impact is transferred to the vehicle body.

exch:applicant-name.name: SAM HWA CAST IRON IND CO LTD
SAM HWA CAST IRON IND. CO., LTD.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A MANHOLE LOCKING DEVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A manhole locking device is provided to enable a user to easily and conveniently lock and unlock a manhole cover by simplifying the structure of the device. CONSTITUTION: A manhole locking device(104) comprises a protruding member. The protruding member is inserted into a housing space of a manhole main body when a manhole cover is locked. When the manhole cover is unlocked, the protruding member is separated from the housing space of the manhole main body. A fixing member is formed on the bottom surface of the housing space, and has a concave part. An elastic member is inserted into the concave part of the fixing member.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR CHARGING CONTROL OF POTABLE DEVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method and a device for controlling the charge of a portable terminal are provided to efficiently use power for charging a battery by controlling the amount of the charge of the battery. CONSTITUTION: A connector unit(140) is connected to an adaptor for charging. A battery(180) is charged with the power provided from the adaptor for charging. A power supply unit(170) inspects and controls the power supplied from the battery. A controller(160) controls the power supply to charge the battery with a first charging amount. The controller controls the power supply to charge the battery with a second charging amount after one hour. The controller determines the charge amount of the battery based on the variation of the charge current supplied to the battery.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: OIL FILTER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An oil filter is provided to increase the flow rate of oil which flows into the venturi pipe after filtered through the first and second filters, thereby enhancing the filtering performance. CONSTITUTION: An oil filter comprises a cylindrical housing(100), a first filter(200), a second filter(300), a discharge pipe(400), and a venture pipe(500). The housing has an inlet hole(111) and an outlet hole(112) through which oil containing contaminants flows in and out. The first filter and the second filter are installed inside the housing, with different permeability. The discharge pipe guides the oil filtered through the second filter to the outlet hole. The venturi pipe is installed on the top of the discharge pipe and connected to the outlet hole. The flow rate of the oil flowing into the venturi pipe is higher than that of the oil filtered through the first filter and of the oil flowing through the discharge pipe. The internal pressure of the venturi pipe is lowed than those of the housing and the discharge pipe so that the oil filtered through the first and second filters is discharged easily through the outlet hole.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PROCESSING METHOD FOR SILICON CARBIDE WAFER CUTTING WASTES AND PROCESSING APPARATUS THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An apparatus and a method for processing a silicon carbide wafer cut waste are provided to prevent a secondary pollution by distilling, separating, and recovering waste water contained in a liquid waste, polyethylene glycol, and waste oil contained in liquid waste. CONSTITUTION: A solid waste is separated from a liquid waste(10). The waste water among the liquid waste is separated with a thin film evaporation method(13). The polyethylene glycol is separated from the separated waste water with a thin film evaporation method(14). The waste oil component of the residual liquid waste of the separated polyethylene glycol is separated with the molecule distillation method and is packed(15). The waste oil residue is divided.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: METHOD AND SYSTEM FOR CHANGING CYCLIC PREFIX LENGTH IN WIRELESS COMMUNICATION SYSTEM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A method and a system for changing a cyclic prefix length in a wireless communication system are provided to flexibly change the length of an cyclic prefix according to a channel state, thereby maintaining stable connection. CONSTITUTION: A BS periodically detects channel state during transmission and reception of data(400). The BS determines the necessity of change of currently set cyclic prefix length(405). The BS sets length change information to 1(410). The BS sets the CP length change information to 0(415). The BS generates similar random sequence(420). The BS transmits a downlink reference signal(425). The downlink reference signal comprises the CP length change information.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A GROUND SUPPORTER MADE OF FIBERGLASS REINFORCED PLASTICS AND THE METHOD OF SLOPE PLANT

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A ground stabilization protector made of a fiber glass reinforced plastic, and a method for planting in a slope using the same are provided to prevent an accident, such as a landslip, by planting trees in a slope. CONSTITUTION: A ground stabilization protector(30) made of a fiber glass reinforced plastic comprises multiple vegetation assist units(10b). The vegetation assist unit is composed of a fiber glass reinforced plastic material, and is formed in a polygon shape. Multiple holes are formed in the side wall of the vegetation assist unit. The side wall prevents the ground from collapsing.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: NON WOVEN FABRIC AND MANUFACTURING METHOD THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: Non-woven fabric and a manufacturing method thereof are provided to effectively restrict decay of the non-woven fabric by sterilizing plant fiber, and to strongly and easily bind the plant fiber by thermal melting of the plant fiber in melting of low-melting fiber. CONSTITUTION: Non-woven fabric(2) is formed by thermally processing web laminates(1) to melt low-melting fiber, and to form the web laminates by laminating webs(1a,1b) prepared by mixed fiber of the low-melting fiber and high-melting fiber. A plant fiber layer(1c) is included between the web laminates, and includes the plant fiber having antibacterial property. The plant fiber is pine fiber made of pine stems.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: EXCIMER LAMP

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An excimer lamp is provided to minimize the unevenness of the excimer lamp regardless of bend direction of an inner tube support by preventing the excimer lamp moving into the center of an inner/outer pipe with protrusion which is on the inner/outer pipe. CONSTITUTION: An inner pipe(110) and an outer pipe are located on the same central axis. An interior pipe support is arranged between the outer pipe and the inner pipe and supports the inner pipe. The inner pipe support has the same angle from the central axis to a circumference direction. The inner pipe support has more than three cut sections of the same shape. The inner pipe support is prevented from being moved to the central axis by a protrusion formed on the inner pipe and outer pipe.

exch:applicant-name.name: KOREA ADVANCED INSTITUTE OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SYSTEM FOR PROVIDING TACTILE FAVICON ACCORDING TO WEB SITE ACCESSING AND METHOD THEREFOR

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A system for providing a tactile favicon according to web site accessing and a method therefor are provided to output different vibration patterns whenever a page of a web site moves, thereby easily identifying a page location which is being processed. CONSTITUTION: A vibration pattern generation module(120) generates vibration favicon information. The vibration pattern generation module generates or stops vibration according to the vibration favicon information. A control module(130) controls the driving frequencies of single or plural driving units. The control module controls the vibration generation or stop.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: A LAUNDRY TREATMENT MACHINE AND THE METHOD OF THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A laundry processing apparatus and a method of controlling the same are provided to enable a course change even after a cycle started and to eliminate the need to turn on/off power for a course change, by initializing the preset course through a reset unit. CONSTITUTION: A method of controlling a laundry processing apparatus comprises the following steps. The power is applied(S1) and in this state, course setting is initialized(S2). After detecting whether there is a user input, a course is set according to the user input(S3). According to the set course, an operation is made(S5). Whether a reset request for initializing the set course exists is detected(S6). If yes, a course set is initialized after returning to the initial set stage.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SPIN HEAD

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A spin head are provided to supports a substrate stably by preventing force from being concentrated on a part of chuck pins. CONSTITUTION: A rotation plate(340) has a spiral screw thread(341) in the outside of an upper side of the rotation plate. A plurality of chuck pins(500) are formed in the lower side to be engaged with screw thread and are protruded to the upper side of the substrate to support the side of the substrate.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: UNIT AND APPARATUS FOR AND METHOD OF SUPPLYING CHEMICAL

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A unit and an apparatus for and a method of supplying liquid medicine are provided to reduce a time for preparing the liquid medicine by simplifying the steps of preparing the liquid medicine. CONSTITUTION: A liquid medicine storing cylinder(100) stores liquid medicine. A liquid medicine supply tube(200) supplies the liquid medicine to the liquid medicine storing cylinder. A liquid medicine valve(210) opens and closes the liquid medicine supply tube. A gas supplying pipe(300) supplies gas to the liquid medicine storing cylinder. The gas valve(310) opens and closes the gas supplying pipe. A transfer pipe(400) transfers the liquid medicine of the liquid medicine storing cylinder to an outlet unit. A transfer valve(410) opens and closes the transfer pipe.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS FOR AND METHOD OF SUPPLYING CHEMICAL

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An apparatus for and a method of supplying a liquid medicine are provided to suppress pressure drop as possible as when switching a liquid medicine tank. CONSTITUTION: A liquid medicine supply unit includes a plurality of liquid medicine supply tanks(100, 200), a liquid medicine supply pipe, a valve, a transfer pipe, and a controller. Liquid medicine supply pipes(110,210) are connected to the liquid medicine tank respectively and supply the stored liquid medicine. The valves(111,211) are installed in the liquid path of the liquid medicine pipe and open and closes the liquid medicine pipe.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: FLAT DISPLAY PANEL SEALING APPARATUS AND METHOD OF THE SAME

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A flat panel display panel sealing apparatus and a method thereof are provided to adhere a first substrate and a second substrate to a cell sealant by heating the cell sealant provided between the first substrate and the second substrate. CONSTITUTION: A stage(10) supports a first substrate and a second substrate. The first substrate and the second substrate are welded by facing each other with the outer sealant inserted into the outside of the unit cells. The cell sealant establishing a flat display panel of a unit cell is inserted into the first substrate and the second substrate. A mask(20) is arranged in the stage. The mask transmits light to the cell sealant. A chamber(30) is provided between the mask and the stage. The chamber pressurizes the first substrate and the second substrate.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PUTTY FOR CONSTRUCTION

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An environment-friendly putty for a construction is provided to increase the health of bodies of users by radiating far infrared rays and negative ions, and to remove formaldehyde. CONSTITUTION: An environment-friendly putty for a construction contains 5~20 parts of titanium dioxide by weight, 20~40 parts of emulsion binder by weight, and 10~30 parts of water by weight for 100 parts of mesh feldspar powder by weight with a particle size of 150~200. The putty additionally includes 2~5 parts of tourmaline powder by weight for 100 parts of mesh feldspar powder by weight. The mesh feldspar powder is porous powder sintered at 600~800 deg C for 1~2 hours. The emulsion binder is a PVC adhesive.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: AUTOMATIC MORTAR

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An automatic pulverizing and mixing apparatus for powder is provided to prevent the powder from being collected on the central floor of a mortar in pulverizing and mixing the powder by forming a protrusion on the central floor of the mortar. CONSTITUTION: An automatic pulverizing and mixing apparatus(100) for powder comprises: a main body(110); a mortar which is located on the upper side of the main body and includes a protrusion on the central floor of the mortar; a holder(130) which is included on one side of the mortar; a pestle(140) in which the upper end is combined with the holder and which the lower end touched with the inner side of the mortar; a rotary unit rotating the mortar; a vibration unit sanctioning vibration to the mortar; and a pressure unit(180) which is located on the upper end of the pestle and applies pressure to make the bottom end of the pestle stick to the inner side of the mortar.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS FOR AND METHOD OF SUPPLYING CHEMICAL

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An apparatus and a method for supplying a chemical solution are provided to maximally suppress the density variation of the chemical solution by including a gas exhaust line on one side of a gas supply line. CONSTITUTION: A chemical solution supply device includes a chemical supply line, a chemical solution storage tank(120), a chemical solution exhaust line, a chemical solution level indication tube(121), a level sensor(122), and a gas supply line. The chemical solution supply line supplies a chemical solution. The chemical solution storage tank receives the chemical solution through the chemical supply line and stores the chemical solution. The chemical exhaust line transfers the chemical solution stored in the chemical solution storage tank to an exhaust position. The chemical solution level indication tube is connected to the chemical solution storage tank. The level sensor is positioned on one side of the chemical solution level indication tube and measures the level of the chemical solution. The gas supply line provides purge gas for purging the chemical solution storage tank to the chemical solution storage tank. The gas supply line includes the gas exhaust line for exhausting the purge gas.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS FOR MANUFACTURING COTTON PELLET

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An apparatus for manufacturing a cotton pallet is provided to enhance molding quality of the pellet, to continuously supply soft cotton by pulverizing the cotton, and to easily coil the pulverized cotton around the leading end of a rotary pin. CONSTITUTION: An apparatus for manufacturing a cotton pallet comprises: a support frame(100) supporting the lower part of the apparatus; a cotton feed unit(200) which pulverizes cotton on upper both sides of the support frame and supplies the cotton; a transport unit(300) transferring the supplied cotton as a constant amount; a molding unit(400) which molds the transferred cotton to a fixed shape; and a storage case(500) which stores the molded cotton on both sides of the support frame.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS FOR SUPPLYING CHEMICAL

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An apparatus for supplying a chemical solution is provided to stably supply the chemical solution by rapidly responding to pressure drop by installing a pressure sensor near a discharge position. CONSTITUTION: An apparatus for supplying a chemical solution includes a chemical solution storage tank(100), a gas supply tube(310), a gas valve(311), a transfer tube(110), a transfer valve(120), and a pressure sensor(510). The chemical solution storage tank stores the chemical solution. The gas supply tube supplies gas to the chemical storage tank. The gas valve opens and closes the gas supply tube. The transfer tube transfers the chemical solution of the chemical storage tank to a discharge position. The transfer valve opens and closes the transfer tube. The pressure sensor is positioned between the transfer valve and the discharge position.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: APPARATUS FOR AND METHOD OF SUPPLYING AND PROCESSING CHEMICAL

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A chemical supply device, a chemical solution processing device including the same, and a chemical solution supplying method thereof are provided to maximally suppress the density variation of a chemical solution by including a gas exhaust line on one side of a gas supply line even through a chemical solution storage tank is purged for a long time. CONSTITUTION: An apparatus for supplying a chemical solution(100) includes a chemical solution supply line, a chemical solution storage tank(120), a chemical solution exhaust line, and a gas supply line. The chemical solution line supplies a chemical solution(10). The chemical solution storage tank receives and storage the chemical solution through the chemical supply line. The chemical solution exhaust line transfers the chemical solution storage in the chemical solution storage tank to an exhaust position. The gas supply line provides purge gas to the chemical solution storage tank. The gas supply line includes the gas exhaust line for exhausting the purge gas on one side.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: CEILING FINISH PANEL

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A ceiling finish material is provided to irradiate far infrared rays and anion for health and to eliminate formaldehyde. CONSTITUTION: A ceiling finish material comprises: 40-60 weight parts of pulp, 20-50 weight parts of water-soluble inorganic binder, and 10-30 weight parts of water in 100 weight parts of enterolith powder. The particle size of the enterolith is 350-500 mesh. Preferably, enterolith powder is fired in 1-2 hours at 600-800°C and porosity is improved. The water-soluble inorganic binder is a sodium silicate liquid or a liquid potassium silicate.

exch:applicant-name.name: SOONCHUNHYANG UNIVERSITY INDUSTRY ACADEMY COOPERATION FOUNDATION

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: COMPOSITION FOR TREATING AND PREVENTING DNA DAMAGE BY MELAMINE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A composition using material preventing or treating DNA damage caused by melamine is provided to detoxify harmful melamine. CONSTITUTION: A pharmaceutical composition for preventing and treating DNA damage caused by melamine(1,3,5-Triazine-2,4,6-triamine) toxicity contains extract of red ginseng, acanthopanax, green tea polyphenol, or cathodic electrolyzed water. The electric potential of the cathodic electrolyzed water is -1000 to -100mV. The extract is isolated using water, low alcohol of C1-C4, or mixture thereof. The electrolyzed water is solution in which pH or oxidation-reduction potential is regulated. The composition is used in the form of liquid, syrup, capsule, granule, powder, ointment, emulsion, gel, or cream.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: PLATE FOR SOUND INSULATION

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A plate for reducing interlayer noise of a building is provided to remarkably reduce interlayer noise by completely absorbing impact, and to reduce construction costs by reducing manufacturing costs. CONSTITUTION: A plate(50) for reducing interlayer noise of a building comprises a first member(52) and a second member(56). The first member and the second member are composed of an expandable polystyrene material or an expandable polypropylene material. Waterproof vinyls(54,58) are attached on one surfaces of the first member and the second member.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: NAVIGATION APPARATUS WITH THE LOCATION DETERMINATOR USING IN THE MOBLIE AND METHOD THEREOF

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A navigation apparatus for a vehicle using positioner and a method thereof are provided to enable a user to check the location on a real time basis without a additional network. CONSTITUTION: A navigation apparatus for a vehicle using positioner comprises a positioner(110) and a navigator(120). The positioner comprises a GPS reception department(111), an input unit(112), a communications unit(113), a storage(114) and a controller(115). The GPS reception department receives a message GPS signal acquisition side information data from a GPS satellite and transmits to the controller. The communications unit is driven with the controller. The storage stores the program and necessary data in the overall operation of the positioner.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: DOOR OF ELECTRIC FURNACE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A door of an electric furnace is provided to prevent the reduction of coupling force due to thermal expansion because the cover plate has a curvature. CONSTITUTION: A door of an electric furnace comprises a rear plate(51) covering a door hole of the electric furnace, a front plate(52) positioned separate from the rear plate, a flow path part(53) built in between the rear plate and the front plate to form a flow path, a cover plate(54) attached to the ends of the rear and front plates, an inlet pipe(55) installed on the upper side of the cover plate and connected to the flow path, an outlet pipe(56) installed on the lower side of the cover plate and connected to the flow path, a water feed pipe(57), a drain pipe(58) and a circulation tank(59).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: DUMMY BAR INSERTING CONTROL DEVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A dummy bar insert control device is provided to prevent a dummy bar from falling by releasing the driver of a lower dummy bar inserting part in a process of transferring the dummy bar. CONSTITUTION: A dummy bar insert control device comprises a dummy bar, an upper dummy bar inserting part, a lower dummy bar inserting part, translation distance detectors(46,56), and a controller(80). The upper dummy bar inserting part inserts the dummy bar into a continual unit. The translation distance detector detects the translation distance of the dummy bar. The controller controls the lower dummy bar inserting part and the upper dummy bar inserting part and inserts the dummy bar into the continual unit.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: HYDRAULIC CYLINDER OF HEATING FURNACE OF WALKING BEAM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A hydraulic cylinder for a walking beam furnace is provided to enable the movement of a piston with the inflow of oil by increasing pressure applied on a piston. CONSTITUTION: A hydraulic cylinder(100) for a walking beam furnace comprises a case(110), a piston(120), a position sensor(130), and a blocking part(140). The piston moves according to the pressure of the oil. The position sensor measures the translation distance of the piston. The blocking part prevents the oil from directly spraying to the position sensor.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: GUIDE BLOCK FOR HOT ROLLING FACILITIES

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A guide block for a rolling mill is provided to reduce times for the assembly of a guide block by mounting the guide pipe on accurate position. CONSTITUTION: A guide block(10) for a rolling mill comprises a guide pipe(20), a lower block(50), an upper block(70), and a fixed block(30). An object passes through the guide pipe. The lower block supports the guide pipe. The upper block fixes the guide pipe. The fixed block fixes the connecting member. The connecting member passes through the lower block and the upper block.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: AIR CONDENSER OF ROLLING SYSTEM

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A cooling device for a rolling system is provided to prevent a rotary shaft and a coupling shaft from being twisted by covering a joint part of a transmission shaft and a rotary shaft.
