CONSTITUTION: A cooling device(100) for a rolling system comprises a motor(110), a rotary shaft(120), a transmission shaft(130), and a cooling fan(140). The rotary shaft is coupled with the motor. The transmission shaft engages with the rotary shaft and delivers the torque. The cooling fan is coupled with the transmission shaft and rotates. The cooling fan discharges the air. The insert body projected from the rotary shaft is inserted into an insertion hole(131) formed in the transmission shaft.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SNAP SHEAR CONTROL DEVICE FOR ROLLING PROCESS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A snap shear control device for a rolling process is provided to minimize the loss of a wire by driving a snap shear within a section which a user wants and cutting the wire. CONSTITUTION: A snap shear control device for a rolling process comprises a plurality of press rollers, a plurality of snap shears, and a mode selection part(130). Multiple snap shears are installed in the inlet of the press roller. The multiple snap shears cuts the material loaded into the press roller. The mode selection part generates signals to drive the snap shear.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: ARGON GAS CONTROL DEVICE FOR REFINERY FURNACE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An argon gas control device for a refinery furnace is provided to prevent the abnormal operation of a valve due to foreign materials by controlling a control valve using argon gas. CONSTITUTION: An argon gas control device for a refinery furnace comprises a second valve(20), a high pressure gas supply part(50), a first valve(10), a flow rate control part(30), and a MICOM. The second valve supplies and blocks argon gas to a refinery furnace. The high pressure gas supply part is installed in an auxiliary supply pipe(82). The first valve supplies the argon gas of the high pressure from the high pressure gas supply part. The MICOM controls the flow rate according to the fluid pressure provided to the refinery furnace.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: JIG DEVICE FOR ROLLER WORKING

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A roller processing jig apparatus adopting a space member is provided to easily separate a roller even if a foreign material is infiltrated between a roller and a connecting rod by keeping the roller separate from the connecting rod. CONSTITUTION: A roller processing jig apparatus comprises a space member(50) and a connecting rod(10). The space member is inserted into a hollow portion(22) of a roller member(20) and supports the roller member. The connecting rod is installed passing through the roller member and the space member.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: COBBLING METHOD FOR ROLLING PROCESS

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A cobble processing method for a rolling process is provided to easily remove wire in which cobble is created by stopping an extraction roller which extracts billets after completely extracting billets. CONSTITUTION: A cobble processing method for a rolling process comprises following steps. A billet is extracted in a furnace of a continuous caster for rolling the billet(S10). The cobble created in a wire which is in a rolling process is sensed(S20). When cobble is created in the wire which is in a rolling process, the rolling process is stopped(S50).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: CONTROL DEVICE AND METHOD FOR ROUGHING MILL MACHINE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A control device of a roughing mill and a control method thereof are provided to rapidly restore a roughing mill as an operator easily grasps the failure cause of a roughing mill. CONSTITUTION: A control method of a roughing mill comprises following steps. A billet is guided to a rolling process from a furnace of a continuous caster for rolling the billet(S20). The trip of an electric panel supplying power to a motor which operating a press roller for a rolling process is sensed(S30). If trip is detected, the power supplied to the motor is blocked after billet loaded in the rolling process is discharged(S40).

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SEPARATOR DRIVING DEVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A separator driving control device is provided to prevent work delay by enabling normal motors to operate if the motor installed at a separator is damaged or some error arises from a motor. CONSTITUTION: A separator driving control device comprises a lifter, a stopper, motors(121,122, ~12n), motor switches(151,152, ~15n) and a controller(110). The lifter transfers the reinforcing bars transferred through each rail. The stopper stops the movement of the reinforcing bars transferred by the lifter. The motor activates the lifter and the stopper. The motor switches enable all motors to be turned individually off. If one or more of the motor switches are turned off, the controller selectively turns off the motor corresponding to the turned-on motor switch to transfer the reinforcing bars through the lifter and the stopper.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: COMPOUND OF WELLBEING PERMANENT ELEMENTS USING PURE GOLD

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A composition for protecting skin, hair root, and hair using pure gold of strong infiltration and agar of strong adhesion is provided. CONSTITUTION: A method or manufacturing permanent pack composition comprises: a step of mixing 0.2 weight% of natural potassium, 0.2 weight% of calcium, 0.2 weight% of magnesium, 0.2 weight% of silicon, 0.2 weight% of iron, 0.2 weight% of sodium, 6 weight% of Rosa multiflora sap, 5 weight% of white jade, 3 weight% of dried Angelica gigas nakai powder, 70 weight% of jelly of vitamin C having 85% of moisture, and 0.3 weight% of pure gold; a step of stirring at 60 rpm; a step of heating at 300°C for 10 minutes; and a step of stirring at 180 rpm.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: VALVE CONTROL DEVICE AND METHOD FOR VACUUM DEGASING OXYGEN BLOWING

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A valve control apparatus for a vacuum melting facility and a control method thereof are provided to prevent the pause of a vacuum melting facility due to the malfunction of the vacuum melting facility by maintaining the state of a power switch which is turned on when an auxiliary contact is turned off. CONSTITUTION: A valve control apparatus for a vacuum melting facility comprises a power supply unit(20), a drain valve(10), a leak switch(120), a power switch(110), an auxiliary contact(130), and a controller(150). The drain valve is controlled according to the electric power supply of a power supply unit. The leak switch blocks a power source applied to a drain valve. The power switch turns on and off a power source applied from the power supply unit to the drain valve. The auxiliary contact turns on and off the power switch based on the on/off of the leak switch. The controller controls the power switch based on the signal generated in the auxiliary contact.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: AUTO SHUT TYPE DOOR

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: An auto-closing door is provided to reduce a safety accident by enabling the door to easily recognize that the door is automatically closed or opened. CONSTITUTION: An auto-closing door comprises a support(10), an inclined part(20), a hanging part(30), and a door plate(40). The support is fixed to a boundary member(1), and has an insertion hole. The inclined part has an inclined cut surface(22). The hanging part has a first member(32) and a second member(34). The first member is inserted into the insertion hole. The second member is bent, and is hung on the inclined part. The door plate is connected to the hanging part, and is rotated.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: CONVEYOR VELOCITY CONTROL DEVICE OF ARRANGEMENT STAND

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A conveyor velocity control device for an arrangement stand is provided to rapidly transfer reinforcing bars to a falling conveyor by controlling the feed conveyor speed of an arrangement stand depending on the number of reinforcing bars in the process of transferring the reinforcing bars to a stacker through the feed conveyor. CONSTITUTION: A conveyor velocity control device for an arrangement stand comprises a feed conveyor driving unit, a counter(42) and a controller(30). The feed conveyor driving unit drives a feed conveyor(20) and the feed conveyor transfers reinforcing bars(80) to a pulling conveyor. The counter counts the number of the reinforcing bars transferred from the pulling conveyor. The controller controls a feed conveyor driving unit depending on the number of the reinforcing bars counted during the reference time.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SUPPORTING DEVICE OF ROLLER

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A roller support device is provided to lessen the adherence of a joint slope and a fixed slope by forming a pad between a joint slope and a fixed slope. CONSTITUTION: A roller support device comprises a fixing part(110), a joint part(120), and a connecting part(130). The fixing part comprises a fixing groove in which a rotary shaft of the roller is mounted. A fixed slope(112) is formed on the upper end of the fixed part. The fixed slope is inclined in the specific direction of the slope. A joint groove is formed in the joint part corresponding to the fixed groove. The connecting part connects the fixing part and the joint.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: FILTER TYPE GRAB DEVICE

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A filter type grab device is provided to prevent the inflow of foreign material included in an oil or damaged part into a pump member by mounting a filter part on an inflow pipe. CONSTITUTION: A filter type grab device comprises a tank member, a pump member(24), and a filter part(30). The tank member stores fluid. The pump member inhales the fluid of the tank member through an inflow pipe passage(26) and transfers the inhaled fluid to a control block(22). The filter part is connected to the inflow pipe passage and filters the foreign material contained in the fluid.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: SAMPLE PICKING APPARATUS FOR HOT ROLLING FACILITIES

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A sample detecting apparatus for a rolling mill is provided to collect foreign materials which are cut by a crop shear to a blocking panel when the sample of an object is required. CONSTITUTION: A sample detecting apparatus for a rolling mill comprises a block panel(52) and a drive part(54). The block panel is installed in an exhaust guide to be moved. The exhaust guide guides the foreign materials cut by the crop shear. The drive part moves the block panel.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: GUIDE ROLLER FOR HOT ROLLING FACILITIES

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A guide apparatus for a rolling mill facility is provided to reduce the assembly time of a guide roller and prevent objects from being deviated by assembling a guide roller in an exact location. CONSTITUTION: A guide apparatus for a rolling mill facility comprises a main body(30), a rotary shaft(50), a nut(80), and a cam(74). The main body comprises a mounting hole(32). The main body is installed between work rollers(10). The cam presses a bearing(72). The bearing is formed between the rotary shaft and a guide roller(70). The nut is coupled with the rotary shaft. A press part is integrated with the nut. The press part presses the cam toward the inside of the mounting hole.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: COOLER FOR GUIDE ROLLER IN HOT ROLLING FACILITIES

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A guide roller cooler for rolling mill facilities is provided to prevent damage and malfunction due to overheat by preventing a guide roller from being overheated by a high temperature object. CONSTITUTION: A guide roller cooler for rolling mill facilities comprises a supply pipe(52), a fixing part(54), an extension part(56), and a nozzle(58). The supply pipe supplies cooling water to a guide roller(32). The guide roller transfers an object. The fixing part is coupled with a main body(30). The guide roller is installed in the main body. The extension part is extended from the supply pipe. The nozzle is formed on the extension part.

exch:bibliographic-data.exch:invention-title: UNINTERRUPTIBLE POWER SUPPLY

exch:abstract.exch:p: PURPOSE: A rectifier of an uninterruptible power supply system is provided to install a first cooling fin and a second cooling fin in parallel by additionally installing a cupola-shaped location control member in one side of a power conversion element. CONSTITUTION: A power conversion element changes an AC power source to a DC power supply by using a semiconductor. One side of a location control member is combined in the power conversion element. The other side of the location control member includes curved surface shaped convex part. The convex part is settled in a groove part of a radiating part(1). The power conversion element uses a SCR(Silicon Controlled Rectify) or an IGBT(Integrated Gate Bipolar Transistor). At least one between the location control member and the radiating part are made of the aluminum material. The location control member is formed into a cupola-shape.
